subclassfeature6.name: Land's Stride
subclassfeature6.description: I can travel through nonmagical, difficult terrain without penalty. I have advantage on saves vs. plants that impede movement by magical influence

subclassfeature10.name: Nature's Ward
subclassfeature10.description: I am immune to poison/disease and I can't be charmed/frightened by elementals or fey

text: Immune to being charmed or frightened by elementals or fey

subclassfeature14.name: Nature's Sanctuary
subclassfeature14.description: When a beast or plant attacks me, it must make a Wis save or pick a different target. If it can't, it automatically misses; On a successful save, it is immune for 24 hours

subclassfeature2.name: Circle Forms
subclassfeature2.description: I am able to transform into more dangerous animal forms when using Wild Shape

subclassfeature2.wild shape.name: Wild Shape
subclassfeature2.wild shape.description:
As a bonus action, I assume the shape of a beast I have seen before with these rules:
    - I gain all its game statistics except Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma
    - I get its skill/saving throw prof. while keeping my own, using whichever is higher
    - I assume the beast's HP and HD; I get mine back when I revert back
    - I can't cast spells in beast form, but transforming doesn't break concentration
    - I retain features from class, race, etc., but I don't retain special senses
    - I can choose whether equipment falls to the ground, merges, or stays worn
    - I revert if out of time or unconscious; if KOd by damage, excess damage carries over

subclassfeature2.1.name: Combat Wild Shape
subclassfeature2.1.description:
As a bonus action while in Wild Shape, I can expend spell slots to heal myself
I regain 1d8 HP per expended spell slot level; I can use Wild Shape as a bonus action

subclassfeature6.name: Primal Strike
subclassfeature6.description: My attacks count as magical while in Wild Shape

subclassfeature10.name: Elemental Wild Shape
subclassfeature10.description: I can transform into an air/earth/fire/water elemental by expending 2 Wild Shape uses

subclassfeature14.name: Thousand Forms
subclassfeature14.description: I can cast Alter Self at will without using spell slots (PHB 211)

subclassfeature2.name: Balm of the Summer Court
subclassfeature2.description: I have a pool of fey energy represented by a number of d6s equal to my druid level. As a bonus action, I can spend dice to heal an ally within 120 ft of me that I can see. I can spend up to half my druid level worth of dice from the pool at once. The ally heals an amount equal to the total rolled and gains 1 temp HP per die spent

subclassfeature6.name: Hearth of Moonlight and Shadow
subclassfeature6.description: At the start of a rest, I can create a 30-ft radius invisible magical sphere. The sphere extends from a point in space I touch, but doesn't expend through total cover. Within this area, my allies and I gain +5 on Wis (Perception) and Dex (Stealth) checks. Also, any light from open flames that are in the sphere is invisible from outside the area. This effect lasts until the end of the rest or when I leave the sphere

subclassfeature10.name: Hidden Paths
subclassfeature10.description: As a bonus action, I can teleport myself up to 60 ft to a spot I can see. As an action, I can teleport a willing ally I touch up to 30 ft to a spot I can see

subclassfeature14.name: Walker in Dreams
subclassfeature14.description: When I finish a short rest, I can cast either Dream, Scrying, or Teleportation Circle. This doesn't require a spell slot or material components; Dream uses me as the messenger. Teleportation Circle connects to the last place I finished a long rest, if on the same plane

subclassfeature2.name: Speech of the Woods
subclassfeature2.description: I can talk with beasts, they understand me and I them, to the limit of their intelligence. This doesn't automatically make me friends with all beasts; Additionally, I learn Sylvan

subclassfeature2.1.name: Spirit Totem
subclassfeature2.1.description:
As a bonus action, I can summon, or move, a spirit to a point I can see within 60 ft. It is a spectral form of a Bear, Hawk, or Unicorn (my choice), with a 30-ft radius aura. It is incorporeal, immobile, doesn't counts as a creature or object, and persists for 1 min. The spirit persists for 1 minute or until I'm incapacitated.
-Bear: my allies and I, if in the aura, immediately gain 5 + my druid level in temp HP. While in the aura, my allies and I gain advantage on Strength checks and saves
-Hawk: As a reaction, I can grant advantage on an attack vs. a target in the aura. While in the aura, my allies and I gain advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks
-Unicorn: my allies and I gain advantage on ability checks to detect targets in the aura. When I cast a healing spell with a spell slot, allies in the aura heal my druid level in HP

subclassfeature6.name: Mighty Summoner
subclassfeature6.description: Beasts or Fey I summon with spells get +2 HP per HD and their attacks count as magical

subclassfeature10.name: Guardian Spirit
subclassfeature10.description: When a Beast or Fey that I summoned ends its turn in my Spirit Totem aura, it heals

subclassfeature14.name: Faithful Summons
subclassfeature14.description: When I am reduced to 0 HP or incapacitated against my will, I can cast Conjure Animals. This is done as if using a 9th-level spell slot to summon 4 beast of my choice up to CR 2. They appear within 20 ft of me, last 1 hour, and protect me from harm and attack foes

druidic.name: Druidic
druidic.description: I know Druidic; Hidden messages with it can only be understood by who know Druidic

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
spellcasting.description: I can cast prepared druid cantrips/spells, using Wisdom as my spellcasting ability. I can use a druidic focus as a spellcasting focus. I can cast my prepared druid spells as rituals if they have the ritual tag

subclassfeature2.name: Druid Circle
subclassfeature2.description: Choose a Circle you can identify with and put it in the Class field on the first page. Choose either the Circle of the Land or the Circle of the Moon

subclassfeature2.wild shape.name: Wild Shape
subclassfeature2.wild shape.description: As an action, I assume the shape of a beast I have seen before with the following rules: I gain all its game statistics except Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma. I get its skill/saving throw prof. while keeping my own, using whichever is higher. I assume the beast's HP and HD; I get mine back when I revert back. I can't cast spells in beast form, but transforming doesn't break concentration. I retain features from class, race, etc., but I don't retain special senses. I can choose whether equipment falls to the ground, merges, or stays worn. I revert if out of time or unconscious; if KOd by damage, excess damage carries over

timeless body.name: Timeless Body
timeless body.description: I age more slowly, only 1 year for every 10 years that pass

beast spells.name: Beast Spells
beast spells.description: I can perform the somatic and verbal components of druid spells while in a beast shape

archdruid.name: Archdruid
archdruid.description: I can use Wild Shape an unlimited number of times. My druid spells don't require verbal, somatic, or free material components

Classes.name: Fighter
skills: Choose two from Acrobatics, Animal Handling, Athletics, History, Insight, Intimidation, Perception, and Survival.
Classes.equipment: Fighter starting equipment: Chain mail -or- leather armor, a longbow, and 20 arrows; A martial weapon and a shield -or- two martial weapons; A light crossbow and 20 bolts -or- two handaxes; A dungeoneer's pack -or- an explorer's pack. Alternatively, choose 5d4 x 10 gp worth of starting equipment instead of both the class' and the background's starting equipment.

subclassfeature3.name: Improved Critical
subclassfeature3.description: I score a critical hit with my weapon attacks on a roll of 19 and 20

atkAdd: if (!isSpell && classes.known.fighter && classes.known.fighter.level > 2 && classes.known.fighter.level < 15 && !CritChance) {var CritChance = 19; fields.Description += (fields.Description ? '; ' : '') + 'Crit on 19-20'; };
My weapon attacks score a critical on a to hit roll of both 19 and 20.

subclassfeature7.name: Remarkable Athlete
subclassfeature7.description: I add half my proficiency bonus to Str/Dex/Con checks if I would otherwise add none. When making running jumps, I add my Strength modifier to the distance in feet

subclassfeature10.name: Additional Fighting Style
subclassfeature10.description: Choose an Additional Fighting Style using the Choose Feature button above

subclassfeature15.name: Superior Critical
subclassfeature15.description: I score a critical hit with my weapon attacks on a roll of 18, 19, and 20

atkAdd: if (!isSpell && classes.known.fighter && classes.known.fighter.level > 14) {if (CritChance) {fields.Description = CritChance <= 18 ? fields.Description : fields.Description.replace('Crit on ' + CritChance + '-20', 'Crit on 18-20'); } else {fields.Description += (fields.Description ? '; ' : '') + 'Crit on 18-20'; }; var CritChance = 18; };
My weapon attacks also score a critical on a to hit roll of 18.

subclassfeature18.name: Survivor
subclassfeature18.description: At the start of my turn, if I'm not above half or at 0 HP, I regain 5 + Con mod HP

subclassfeature3.name: Combat Superiority
subclassfeature3.description:
I gain a number of superiority dice that I can use to fuel special Maneuvers
   I regain all superiority dice after a short rest

subclassfeature3.1.name: Maneuvers
subclassfeature3.1.description:
Use the Choose Feature button above to add a Maneuver to the third page
   I can use a Maneuver by expending a superiority die (only one Maneuver per attack)

commander's strike.name: Commander's Strike
commander's strike.description:
I forgo one attack of my Attack action to use a bonus action to direct an ally I see/hear
The ally can use a reaction to make an attack, adding the superiority die to damage

disarming attack.name: Disarming Attack
disarming attack.description:
Use after hitting a creature; I add the superiority die to my attack's damage
Target makes a Strength save or drops a held object of my choice to its feet

distracting strike.name: Distracting Strike
distracting strike.description:
Use after hitting a creature; I add the superiority die to my attack's damage
The next attack of an ally before my next turn has adv. against the creature

evasive footwork.name: Evasive Footwork
evasive footwork.description: Use when moving; I add the superiority die to my AC until I stop moving

feinting attack.name: Feinting Attack
feinting attack.description:
As a bonus action, I can feint to gain adv. on my next attack against a target within 5 ft
If the attack hits, I add the superiority die to my attack's damage

goading attack.name: Goading Attack
goading attack.description:
Use after hitting a creature; I add the superiority die to my attack's damage
Target makes a Wis save or has disadv. vs. other targets until the end of my next turn

lunging attack.name: Lunging Attack
lunging attack.description:
I can spend a superiority die to increase the reach of a melee weapon attack by 5 ft
If the attack hits, I add the superiority die to my attack's damage

maneuvering attack.name: Maneuvering Attack
maneuvering attack.description:
Use after hitting a creature; I add the superiority die to my attack's damage
Ally can use reaction to move half speed without opportunity attack from the target

menacing attack.name: Menacing Attack
menacing attack.description:
Use after hitting a creature; I add the superiority die to my attack's damage
Target makes a Wisdom save or is frightened of me until the end of my next turn

parry.name: Parry
parry.description: When damaged in melee, I can use a reaction to reduce it by superiority die + Dex mod

precision attack.name: Precision Attack
precision attack.description: I add the superiority die to my attack roll, either before or after rolling

pushing attack.name: Pushing Attack
pushing attack.description:
Use after hitting a creature; I add the superiority die to the attack's damage
If target is Large or smaller, it must make a Strength save or be pushed up to 15 ft away

rally.name: Rally
rally.description: Ally that can see/hear me gets temporary HP equal to superiority die + Charisma mod

riposte.name: Riposte
riposte.description:
When missed in melee, I can use my reaction to make one melee attack vs. the attacker
If the attack hits, I add the superiority die to my attack's damage

sweeping attack.name: Sweeping Attack
sweeping attack.description:
Use after hitting a creature and a second creature is within 5 ft of the first
If the original attack roll hits this second creature, it takes the superiority die in damage

trip attack.name: Trip Attack
trip attack.description:
Use after hitting a creature; I add the superiority die to the attack's damage
If target is Large or smaller, it must make a Strength save or be knocked prone

subclassfeature3.2.name: Student of War
subclassfeature3.2.description: I have proficiency with one artisan's tool set of my choice

subclassfeature7.name: Know Your Enemy
subclassfeature7.description: If I spend 1 min studying someone, the DM will tell me info about him/her

subclassfeature10.name: Improved Combat Superiority
subclassfeature10.description: My superiority dice turn into d10s at 10th level and into d12s at 18th level

subclassfeature15.name: Relentless
subclassfeature15.description: I regain one superiority die if I have no more remaining when I roll initiative

action surge.name: Action Surge
action surge.description: I can take one additional action on my turn on top of my normally allowed actions

subclassfeature3.name: Spellcasting
subclassfeature3.description: I can cast known wizard cantrips/spells, using Intelligence as my spellcasting ability

subclassfeature3.1.name: Weapon Bond
subclassfeature3.1.description:
I can bond with up to two weapons by spending a short rest with each
   I can't be disarmed of a bonded weapon and I can summon one as a bonus action

subclassfeature7.name: War Magic
subclassfeature7.description: When I use my action to cast a cantrip, I can make a weapon attack as a bonus action

subclassfeature10.name: Eldritch Strike
subclassfeature10.description:
A creature hit by my weapon attack has disadv. on the save vs. the next spell I cast
   This lasts until the end of my next turn

subclassfeature15.name: Arcane Charge
subclassfeature15.description:
When I use Action Surge, I can also teleport up to 30 ft to an empty space I can see
   I can do so before or after the extra action

subclassfeature18.name: Improved War Magic
subclassfeature18.description: When I use my action to cast a spell, I can make a weapon attack as a bonus action

subclassfeature3.name: Rallying Cry
subclassfeature3.description: When I use Second Wind, I also heal three allies within 60 ft that can see or hear me
subclassfeature3.eval: RemoveAction('bonus action', 'Second Wind'); AddAction('bonus action', 'Second Wind (+ Rallying Cry)', 'Purple Dragon Knight')
subclassfeature3.removeeval: RemoveAction('bonus action', 'Second Wind (+ Rallying Cry)'); AddAction('bonus action', 'Second Wind', 'Fighter')

subclassfeature7.name: Royal Envoy
subclassfeature7.description:
I gain proficiency with the Persuasion skill and I gain expertise with the Persuasion skill
If already proficient, I can choose Animal Handling, Insight, Intimidation, or Perform
subclassfeature7.skillstxt: Purple Dragon Knight (Royal Envoy): Persuasion proficiency and expertise; if already proficient, choose one from Animal Handling, Insight, Intimidation, and Performance.

subclassfeature10.name: Inspiring Surge
subclassfeature10.description:
When I use my Action Surge, I can inspire an ally within 60 ft that can see or hear me
The ally can then use its reaction to make one melee or ranged weapon attack

subclassfeature15.name: Bulwark
subclassfeature15.description:
When I use Indomitable to reroll a Int, Wis, or Cha save, I can extend it to an ally
The ally can reroll its failed saving throw against the same effect and take the result
It only works if not incapacitated and the ally is within 60 ft and can see or hear me

subclassfeature3.name: Arcane Archer's Lore
subclassfeature3.description: I gain proficiency with either the Arcana or Nature skill. I also learn either the Prestidigitation or the Druidcraft cantrip

subclassfeature3.1.name: Arcane Shot
subclassfeature3.1.description: I can unleash magical effects when I fire an arrow from a short- or longbow. I can use this once per turn as part of the Attack action, after an attack hits. I know a number of Arcane Shot Options and learn additional at certain levels

banishing arrow [abjuration].name: Banishing Arrow [Abjuration]
banishing arrow [abjuration].description: The target makes a Cha save or is banished to the Feywild until the end of its next turn. While banished, its speed is 0 and is incapacitated; It re-appearing in the same spot. When I reach 18th level, this Arcane Shot Option also does an extra 2d6 force damage

beguiling arrow [enchantment].name: Beguiling Arrow [Enchantment]
beguiling arrow [enchantment].description: The target takes extra psychic damage and must succeed on a Wisdom save. If failed, it is charmed by one of my allies within 30 ft of it that I choose. This lasts until my next turn starts or until the chosen ally attacks the target in any way

bursting arrow [evocation].name: Bursting Arrow [Evocation]
bursting arrow [evocation].description: The target, in addition to the shot, and all creatures within 10 ft of it take damage

enfeebling arrow [necromancy].name: Enfeebling Arrow [Necromancy]
enfeebling arrow [necromancy].description: The target takes extra necrotic damage and must make a Constitution save. If failed, the damage of the target's attacks are halved until the start of my next turn

grasping arrow [conjuration].name: Grasping Arrow [Conjuration]
grasping arrow [conjuration].description: The target takes extra poison damage as brambles wrap around it for 1 minute. The brambles give it -10 ft speed and do it slashing damage every round it moves. These can be removed by it or another as an action with Strength (Athletics) vs. my DC

piercing arrow [transmutation].name: Piercing Arrow [Transmutation]
piercing arrow [transmutation].description: With this I don't roll for the attack, but shoot the arrow in a 30-ft long, 1-ft wide line. It passes through objects, ignoring cover, but all creatures in the area take damage. The damage is the same as a normal hit from my attack, plus extra piercing damage. A creature can make a Dexterity save to reduce the damage by half

seeking arrow [divination].name: Seeking Arrow [Divination]
seeking arrow [divination].description: With this I don't roll for the attack, but I choose a target I have seen in the last minute. The seeking arrow moves around corners, obstacles, and ignores cover to hit the target. It is hit if it is within the weapon's range and there is a path for the arrow to get to it. The target takes the full damage of the attack plus extra force damage. It can make a Dexterity save to reduce the damage by half; If failed, I know its location

shadow arrow [illusion].name: Shadow Arrow [Illusion]
shadow arrow [illusion].description: The target takes extra psychic damage and must succeed on a Wisdom save. If failed, the target can't see anything beyond 5 ft until the end of my next turn

subclassfeature7.name: Magic Arrow
subclassfeature7.description: Whenever I fire a nonmagical arrow from a short- or longbow, I can make it magical

subclassfeature7.1.name: Curving Shot
subclassfeature7.1.description: Once per turn when I miss with a magic arrow, I can use a bonus action to redirect it. I reroll the attack against a different target within 60 ft of the original target

subclassfeature15.name: Ever-Ready Shot
subclassfeature15.description: I regain one use of Arcane Shot if I have no more remaining when I roll initiative

subclassfeature3.name: Bonus Proficiency
subclassfeature3.description: I gain proficiency with Animal Handling, History, Insight, Performance, or Persuasion. Alternatively, I learn one language; Use the "Choose Feature" button above for this
choices: Skill proficiency: Animal Handling, History, Insight, Performance, or Persuasion

language proficiency.name: Bonus Proficiency
language proficiency.description: I learn one language of my choice

skill proficiency: animal handling, hist.name: Bonus Proficiency
skill proficiency: animal handling, hist.description: I gain proficiency with Animal Handling, History, Insight, Performance, or Persuasion
skill proficiency: animal handling, hist.skillstxt: Choose one from: Animal Handling, History, Insight, Performance, or Persuasion.

subclassfeature3.1.name: Born in the Saddle
subclassfeature3.1.description: I have advantage on saves to avoid falling off my mount, and land on my feet if I fail. Mounting or dismounting a creature costs me only 5 ft of movement instead of half

subclassfeature3.2.name: Unwavering Mark
subclassfeature3.2.description: If I hit a creature with a melee weapon attack, I mark it until the end of my next turn. While it is within 5 ft of me, a marked target has disadv. on attacks not directed at me. If it damages anybody but me, I can make a special melee attack vs. it in my next turn. This takes a bonus action, but has adv. and adds half my fighter level to the damage. A mark ends early if I'm incapacitated, die, or somebody else marks the target

atkCalc: if (isMeleeWeapon && classes.known.fighter && classes.known.fighter.level > 2 && (/\b(unwavering.?mark|marked)\b/i).test(WeaponText)) { output.extraDmg += Math.floor(classes.known.fighter.level/2); };
If I include the words 'Unwavering Mark' or 'Marked' in the name or description of a melee weapon, it gets half my fighter level added to its Damage.

subclassfeature7.name: Warding Maneuver
subclassfeature7.description: As a reaction when I or a creature within 5 ft is hit, I can try to fend off the strike. I add 1d8 to the target's AC; If the attack still hits, the target has resistance against it. I can only do this while wielding a melee weapon or a shield

subclassfeature10.name: Hold the Line
subclassfeature10.description: Creatures provoke opportunity attacks when moving 5 ft or more while within my reach. If I hit an opportunity attack, the target's speed is reduced to 0 until the end of the turn

subclassfeature15.name: Ferocious Charger
subclassfeature15.description: If I hit a creature after moving 10 ft in a straight line, it must make a Strength save. If failed, the target is knocked prone; I can do this only once per turn

subclassfeature18.name: Vigilant Defender
subclassfeature18.description: I can make opportunity attacks without using my reaction. I can do this only once on every creature's turn, except on my own turn. I can't do this on the same turn that I use my normal reaction

subclassfeature3.name: Bonus Proficiency
subclassfeature3.description: I gain proficiency with History, Insight, Performance, or Persuasion. Alternatively, I learn one language;
choices: Skill proficiency: History, Insight, Performance, or Persuasion

language proficiency.name: Bonus Proficiency
language proficiency.description: I learn one language of my choice

skill proficiency: history, insight, per.name: Bonus Proficiency
skill proficiency: history, insight, per.description: I gain proficiency with History, Insight, Performance, or Persuasion
skill proficiency: history, insight, per.skillstxt: Choose one from: History, Insight, Performance, or Persuasion.

subclassfeature3.1.name: Fighting Spirit
subclassfeature3.1.description: As a bonus action, I can give myself advantage on weapon attacks and temporary HP. This advantage on weapon attack rolls lasts until the end of my current turn

subclassfeature7.name: Elegant Courtier
subclassfeature7.description: I can add my Wisdom modifier to any Charisma (Persuasion) checks I make. I gain proficiency with Wis saves, or if I'm already proficient, either Int or Cha saves

addMod.text: I can add my Wisdom modifier to any Charisma (Persuasion) checks I make.

subclassfeature10.name: Tireless Spirit
subclassfeature10.description: I regain one use of Fighting Spirit if I have no more remaining when I roll initiative

subclassfeature15.name: Rapid Strike
subclassfeature15.description: With the Attack action, I can forgo advantage on one attack to make one extra attack. This extra attack is part of the same action; I can do this only once per turn

subclassfeature18.name: Strength Before Death
subclassfeature18.description: If I'm reduced to 0 HP but not killed outright, I can delay falling unconscious. I then immediately take a bonus turn, interrupting the current turn. While I'm at 0 HP, I suffer damage normally and die if I have 3 failed death saves. If I'm still at 0 HP at the end of this bonus turn, I fall unconscious

fighting style.name: Fighting Style
fighting style.description: Choose a Fighting Style for the fighter using the "Choose Feature" button above

second wind.name: Second Wind
second wind.description: As a bonus action, I regain 1d10 + fighter level HP; I can use this once per short rest

action surge.name: Action Surge
action surge.description: I can take one additional action on my turn on top of my normally allowed actions

subclassfeature3.name: Martial Archetype
subclassfeature3.description: Choose a Martial Archetype you strive to emulate and put it in the Class field. Choose either Champion, Battle Master, Eldritch Knight, or Purple Dragon Knight

indomitable.name: Indomitable
indomitable.description: I can reroll a failed saving throw, but must keep the new result

Classes.name: Monk
skills: Choose two from Acrobatics, Athletics, History, Insight, Religion, and Stealth.
Classes.equipment:
Monk starting equipment: A shortsword -or- any simple weapon; A dungeoneer's pack -or- an explorer's pack; 10 darts.

Alternatively, choose 5d4 gp worth of starting equipment instead of both the class' and the background's starting equipment.

subclassfeature3.name: Hand Technique
subclassfeature3.description: Whenever I hit a creature with a Flurry of Blows attack I can do one of the following: Have it make a Dexterity save or be knocked prone; Have it make a Strength save or be pushed up to 15 ft away from me; Stop it from taking reactions until the end of my next turn;

subclassfeature6.name: Wholeness of Body
subclassfeature6.description: As an action, I regain hit points equal to three times my monk level

subclassfeature11.name: Tranquility
subclassfeature11.description: After a long rest, I gain the effect of a Sanctuary spell until a next long rest (PHB 272)
subclassfeature11.changeeval: if (newClassLvl.monk >= 17 && (What('Extra.Notes') + What('Class Features')).toLowerCase().indexOf('quivering palm') === -1) {ClassFeatureOptions(['monk', 'subclassfeature11', 'quivering palm', 'extra'])} else if (newClassLvl.monk < 17 && oldClassLvl.monk >= 17) {ClassFeatureOptions(['monk', 'subclassfeature11', 'quivering palm', 'extra'], 'remove')

quivering palm.name: Quivering Palm
quivering palm.description: [3 ki points] When I hit a creature with an unarmed strike, I can start imperceptible vibrations. Within my monk level in days, I can use an action to have the creature make a Con save. If it fails, it is reduced to 0 hit points; If it succeeds, it takes 10d10 necrotic damage

subclassfeature3.name: Disciple of the Elements
subclassfeature3.description:
I know Elemental Attunement and additional Elemental Disciplines, depending on level
   Use the "Choose Feature" button above to add Elemental Disciplines to the third page
   From 5th level onward, I can use additional ki points to increase their spell slot level
   I can trade known Elemental Disciplines for others when I gain new ones
extrachoices: Clench of the North Wind (prereq: level 6 monk)
Flames of the Phoenix (prereq: level 11 monk)
Gong of the Summit (prereq: level 6 monk)
Rive of Hungry Flame (prereq: level 17 monk)
Wave of Rolling Earth (prereq: level 17 monk)

elemental attunement.name: Elemental Attunement
elemental attunement.description:
As an action, I can briefly control elemental forces nearby
   I can make a harmless sensory effect, light/snuff light, chill/warm 1 lb for 1 hour,
   or I cause earth/fire/water/mist in a 1 ft cube to shape itself into a form for 1 minute

breath of winter (prereq: level 17 monk).name: Breath of Winter
breath of winter (prereq: level 17 monk).description:
[6 ki points]
   As an action, I can cast Cone of Cold without material components (PHB 224)

clench of the north wind (prereq: level.name: Clench of the North Wind
clench of the north wind (prereq: level.description:
[3 ki points]
   As an action, I can cast Hold Person without material components (PHB 251)

eternal mountain defense (prereq: level.name: Eternal Mountain Defense
eternal mountain defense (prereq: level.description:
[5 ki points]
   As an action, I can cast Stoneskin on myself without material components (PHB 278)

fangs of the fire snake.name: Fangs of the Fire Snake
fangs of the fire snake.description:
[1 ki point]
   With Attack action, my unarmed strikes +10 ft reach and deal fire damage this turn
   Also, I can spent an additional 1 ki point to cause an attack to deal +1d10 fire damage

atkAdd: if ((/unarmed strike/i).test(WeaponName) && (/^(?=.*fire)(?=.*snake).*$/i).test(WeaponText)) {fields.Description += (fields.Description ? '; ' : '') + 'After hit, spend 1 ki point for +1d10 fire damage'; fields.Range:'Melee (15 ft reach)'; fields.Damage_Type:'fire'; };
If I include the words 'Fire Snake' in the name of an unarmed strike, it gets +10 ft reach, does fire damage, and gains the option to deal +1d10 fire damage by spending 1 additional ki point.

fist of four thunders.name: Fist of Four Thunders
fist of four thunders.description:
[2 ki points]
   As an action, I can cast Thunderwave (PHB 282)

fist of unbroken air.name: Fist of Unbroken Air
fist of unbroken air.description:
[2 ki points; +1d10/extra ki point]
   As an action, target within 30 ft takes 3d10 bludgeoning damage (spend ki for more)
   It is also pushed up to 20 ft away from me and knocked prone
   It can make a Strength save to halve damage and avoid being pushed and knocked prone

flames of the phoenix (prereq: level 11.name: Flames of the Phoenix
flames of the phoenix (prereq: level 11.description:
[4 ki points]
   As an action, I can cast Fireball without material components (PHB 241)

gong of the summit (prereq: level 6 monk.name: Gong of the Summit
gong of the summit (prereq: level 6 monk.description:
[3 ki points]
   As an action, I can cast Shatter without material components (PHB 275)

mist stance (prereq: level 11 monk).name: Mist Stance
mist stance (prereq: level 11 monk).description:
[4 ki points]
   As an action, I can cast Gaseous Form on myself without material components (PHB 244)

ride the wind (prereq: level 11 monk).name: Ride the Wind
ride the wind (prereq: level 11 monk).description:
[4 ki points]
   As an action, I can cast Fly on myself without material components (PHB 243)

rive of hungry flame (prereq: level 17 m.name: Rive of Hungry Flame
rive of hungry flame (prereq: level 17 m.description:
[5 ki points]
   As an action, I can cast Wall of Fire without material components (PHB 285)

rush of the gale spirits.name: Rush of the Gale Spirits
rush of the gale spirits.description:
[2 ki points]
   As an action, I can cast Gust of Wind without material components (PHB 248)

shape the flowing river.name: Shape the Flowing River
shape the flowing river.description:
[1 ki point]
   As an action, I can affect ice/water up to a 30-foot cube within 120 ft
   I can switch it between water/ice states and reshape ice up to half its largest dimension

sweeping cinder strike.name: Sweeping Cinder Strike
sweeping cinder strike.description:
[2 ki points]
   As an action, I can cast Burning Hands (PHB 220)

water whip.name: Water Whip
water whip.description:
[2 ki points; +1d10/extra ki point]
   As an action, a creature within 30 ft takes 3d10 bludgeoning damage (spend ki for more)
   It is also knocked prone or pulled up to 25 ft closer to me (my choice)
   It can make a Dexterity save to halve damage and avoid being pulled or knocked prone

wave of rolling earth (prereq: level 17.name: Wave of Rolling Earth
wave of rolling earth (prereq: level 17.description:
[6 ki points]
   As an action, I can cast Wall of Stone without material components (PHB 287)

subclassfeature3.name: Shadow Arts
subclassfeature3.description: I know the Minor Illusion cantrip and can cast certain spells by using ki (see page 3)
subclassfeature3.eval: ClassFeatureOptions(['monk', 'subclassfeature3', 'darkness', 'extra']); ClassFeatureOptions(['monk', 'subclassfeature3', 'darkvision', 'extra']); ClassFeatureOptions(['monk', 'subclassfeature3', 'pass without trace', 'extra']); ClassFeatureOptions(['monk', 'subclassfeature3', 'silence', 'extra']);
subclassfeature3.removeeval: ClassFeatureOptions(['monk', 'subclassfeature3', 'darkness', 'extra'], 'remove'); ClassFeatureOptions(['monk', 'subclassfeature3', 'darkvision', 'extra'], 'remove'); ClassFeatureOptions(['monk', 'subclassfeature3', 'pass without trace', 'extra'], 'remove'); ClassFeatureOptions(['monk', 'subclassfeature3', 'silence', 'extra'], 'remove');

darkness.name: Darkness
darkness.description:
[2 ki points]
   As an action, I can cast Darkness without material components (PHB 230)

darkvision.name: Darkvision
darkvision.description:
[2 ki points]
   As an action, I can cast Darkvision without material components (PHB 230)

pass without trace.name: Pass Without Trace
pass without trace.description:
[2 ki points]
   As an action, I can cast Pass without Trace without material components (PHB 264)

silence.name: Silence
silence.description:
[2 ki points]
   As an action, I can cast Silence (PHB 275)

subclassfeature6.name: Shadow Step
subclassfeature6.description:
As a bonus action, I can teleport from and into dim light or darkness within 60 ft
   After I do this, I have adv. on the next melee attack I make before the end of my turn

subclassfeature11.name: Cloak of Shadows
subclassfeature11.description: As an action, I can become invisible in dim light or darkness until I attack/cast

subclassfeature17.name: Opportunist
subclassfeature17.description: As a reaction, if a creature in 5 ft is hit by another, I can make a melee attack vs. it

subclassfeature3.name: Touch of Death
subclassfeature3.description: If I reduce someone within 5 ft to 0 HP, I gain Wis mod + monk level temporary HP

subclassfeature6.name: Hour of Reaping
subclassfeature6.description:
As an action, all creatures within 30 feet of me must make a Wisdom saving throw
On a failed save the creature is frightened until the end of my next turn

subclassfeature11.name: Mastery of Death
subclassfeature11.description: When I'm reduced to 0 HP, I can expend 1 ki point to have 1 HP instead
subclassfeature11.changeeval: if (newClassLvl.monk >= 17 && (What('Extra.Notes') + What('Class Features')).toLowerCase().indexOf('touch of the long death') === -1) {ClassFeatureOptions(['monk', 'subclassfeature11', 'touch of the long death', 'extra'])} else if (newClassLvl.monk < 17 && oldClassLvl.monk >= 17) {ClassFeatureOptions(['monk', 'subclassfeature11', 'touch of the long death', 'extra'], 'remove')};

touch of the long death.name: Touch of the Long Death
touch of the long death.description: [1-10 ki points] As an action, a target within 5 ft takes 2d10 necrotic damage per ki point I spent. It can make a Constitution saving throw to half the damage

subclassfeature3.name: Radiant Sun Bolt
subclassfeature3.description: I gain a ranged spell attack that I can use as an attack in the Attack action. If I do this and spend 1 ki point, I can make 2 of these attacks as a bonus action
subclassfeature3.changeeval: if (newClassLvl.monk >= 6 && (What('Extra.Notes') + What('Class Features')).toLowerCase().indexOf('searing arc strike') === -1) {ClassFeatureOptions(['monk', 'subclassfeature3', 'searing arc strike', 'extra'])} else if (newClassLvl.monk < 6 && oldClassLvl.monk >= 6) {ClassFeatureOptions(['monk', 'subclassfeature3', 'searing arc strike', 'extra'], 'remove')};

searing arc strike.name: Searing Arc Strike
searing arc strike.description:
After taking the Attack action, I can cast Burning Hands as a bonus action [PHB 220]
For every additional ki point I spend, Burning hands is cast at 1 higher spell level
The maximum total ki points I can spend for this (including the 2) is half my Monk level

subclassfeature11.name: Searing Sunburst
subclassfeature11.description: As an action, anyone in a 20-ft radius light on a point within 150 ft makes a Con save. If failed and not behind opaque total cover, take 2d6 (+ 2d6/ki point) radiant damage

subclassfeature17.name: Sun Shield
subclassfeature17.description: As a reaction, when I'm hit by a melee attack, I can deal 5 + Wis mod radiant damage. I can only do this while my light aura is on; I can turn it on/off as a bonus action
subclassfeature17.eval: AddAction('reaction', 'Sun Shield (hit in melee)', 'Monk (Way of the Sun Soul)')

subclassfeature3.name: Bonus Proficiencies
subclassfeature3.description: I gain proficiency with the Performance skill and brewer's supplies

subclassfeature3.1.name: Drunken Technique
subclassfeature3.1.description: When using Flurry of Blows, I gain the benefits of a Disengage and +10 ft speed this turn

subclassfeature6.name: Tipsy Sway
subclassfeature6.description: 1 ki point: as a reaction if missed in melee, attacker instead hits other I see within 5 ft
subclassfeature6.additional: Standing up from prone costs only 5 ft

subclassfeature11.name: Drunkard's Luck
subclassfeature11.description: By spending 2 ki points, I can remove disadv. from an ability check, attack roll, or save

subclassfeature17.name: Intoxicated Frenzy
subclassfeature17.description: I can make 3 extra attacks with Flurry of Blows if each is used on a different target

subclassfeature3.name: Path of the Kensei
subclassfeature3.description:
I gain proficiency with either calligrapher's supplies or painter's supplies. Some weapons, that don't have the heavy or special property, are kensei weapons for me. At least one ranged and one melee weapon, more at higher levels (longbow does qualify). With these: proficient, count as a monk weapons, special bonuses depending on type held:
-Melee: if I do unarmed strike during an Attack action, +2 AC until my next turn starts
-Ranged: as a bonus action, ranged weapon attacks deal +1d4 damage in current turn

atkAdd: var monkDie:function(n) {return n < 5 ? 4 : n < 11 ? 6 : n < 17 ? 8 : 10;}; if (classes.known.monk && classes.known.monk.level > 2 && theWea && !isSpell && !theWea.monkweapon && (!(/heavy|special/i).test(fields.Description) || WeaponName === 'longbow') && WeaponText.toLowerCase().indexOf('kensei') !== -1) {var aMonkDie:aMonkDie ? aMonkDie : monkDie(classes.known.monk.level); try {var curDie:eval(fields.Damage_Die.replace('d', '*'));} catch (e) {var curDie:'x';}; if (isNaN(curDie) || curDie < aMonkDie) {fields.Damage_Die:'1d' + aMonkDie; }; if (theWea.ability === 1) {fields.Mod:StrDex; }; if (isRangedWeapon) {fields.Description += (fields.Description ? '; ' : '') + 'As bonus action with Attack action, +1d4 damage'; }; fields.Proficiency:true; };

If I inlcude the word 'Kensei' in the name of a weapon that doesn't have the Heavy or Special attribute, or that is a longbow, that weapon gains the same benefits as any other 'Monk Weapon'.
In addition, with ranged 'Kensei Weapons', I can take a bonus action to have that hit, and any other hit after that as part of the same action, do +1d4 damage.

ki-empowered strikes.name: One with the Blade
ki-empowered strikes.description: My unarmed strikes and kensei weapon attacks count as magical

'; ' : '') + 'Counts as magical';};
My unarmed strikes and any Kensei Weapons count as magical for overcoming resistances and immunities.

deft strike.name: Deft Strike
deft strike.description: Once per turn when I hit with a kensei weapon, I can do a martial arts die extra damage

subclassfeature17.name: Unerring Accuracy
subclassfeature17.description: Once per turn, if I miss a monk weapon attack on my turn, I can reroll the attack roll

sharpen the blade.name: Sharpen the Blade
sharpen the blade.description: As a bonus action, I can grant my kensei weapon a bonus to attack and damage rolls. This bonus is equal to the number of ki points I spend and doesn't stack with magic. This lasts for 1 minute or until I use this feature again

subclassfeature17.changeeval: if (newClassLvl.monk >= 11 && (What('Extra.Notes') + What('Class Features')).toLowerCase().indexOf('sharpen the blade') === -1) {ClassFeatureOptions(['monk', 'subclassfeature17', 'sharpen the blade', 'extra'])} else if (newClassLvl.monk <= 11 && oldClassLvl.monk >= 11) {ClassFeatureOptions(['monk', 'subclassfeature17', 'sharpen the blade', 'extra'], 'remove')}

unarmored defense.name: Unarmored Defense
unarmored defense.description: Without armor and no shield, my AC is 10 + Dexterity modifier + Wisdom modifier

martial arts.name: Martial Arts
martial arts.description: Monk weapons: shortsword, simple weapon (not two-handed/heavy), unarmed strike. With these, I can use Dex instead of Str and use the Martial Arts damage die. When taking an Attack action with these, I get one unarmed strike as a bonus action
martial arts.eval: AddString('Extra.Notes', 'Monk features:\n\u25C6 Lose Unarmored Defense, Martial Arts, and Unarmored Movement with armor/shields', true);
martial arts.removeeval: RemoveString('Extra.Notes', 'Monk features:\n\u25C6 Lose Unarmored Defense, Martial Arts, and Unarmored Movement with armor/shields', true);

I can use either Strength or Dexterity and my Martial Arts damage die in place of the normal damage die for any 'Monk Weapons', which include unarmed strike, shortsword, and any simple melee weapon that is not two-handed or heavy.

ki.name: Ki
ki.description: I can spend ki to fuel special actions (see third page). I need to meditate for at least 30 min of a short rest for that short rest to restore ki

flurry of blows.name: Flurry of Blows
flurry of blows.description: [1 ki point] After taking the Attack action, I can make 2 unarmed attacks as a bonus action

patient defense.name: Patient Defense
patient defense.description: [1 ki point] As a bonus action, I can take the Dodge action

step of the wind.name: Step of the Wind
step of the wind.description: [1 ki point] As a bonus action, I can either Dash or Disengage; My jump distance doubles when I do so

stunning strike.name: Stunning Strike
stunning strike.description: [1 ki point] After I hit a creature with a melee weapon attack, I can spend a ki point to try to stun it. It has to succeed on a Con save or be stunned until the end of my next turn

unarmored movement.name: Unarmored Movement
unarmored movement.description: Speed increases and eventually lets me traverse some surfaces without falling as I move
unarmored movement.additional: levels.map(function(n) {if (n< 2)return '';if (n< 6)return '+10 ft';if (n< 9)return '+15 ft';if (n< 10)return '+15 ft; Vertical surfaces and liquids';if (n< 14)return '+20 ft;Vertical surfaces and liquids';if (n< 18)return '+25 ft; Vertical surfaces and liquids';return '+30 ft; Vertical surfaces and liquids';})
