subclassfeature3.name: Monastic Tradition
subclassfeature3.description: Choose a Monastic Tradition to commit to and put it in the Class field on page 1. Choose either Way of the Four Elements, Long Death, Open Hand, Shadow, or Sun Soul

deflect missiles.name: Deflect Missiles
deflect missiles.description: As a reaction, I can reduce ranged weapon attack damage done to me. If the damage is negated, I catch and may throw it back (20/60 ft) as a monk weapon

slow fall.name: Slow Fall
slow fall.description: As a reaction, I can reduce any falling damage I take by five times my monk level

ki-empowered strikes.name: Ki-Empowered Strikes
ki-empowered strikes.description: My unarmed strikes count as magical for overcoming resistances and immunities

atkAdd: if ((/unarmed strike/i).test(WeaponName)) {fields.Description += (fields.Description ? '; ' : '') + 'Counts as magical';};
My unarmed strikes count as magical for overcoming resistances and immunities.

evasion.name: Evasion
evasion.description: My Dexterity saves vs. areas of effect negate damage on success and halve it on failure

text: Dex save vs. area effects: fail ― half dmg, success ― no dmg

stillness of mind.name: Stillness of Mind
stillness of mind.description: As an action, I can end one effect on me that causes me to be charmed or frightened

purity of body.name: Purity of Body
purity of body.description: My mastery of the ki flowing through me makes me immune to poison and disease: I am immune to poison and disease

tongue of the sun and moon.name: Tongue of the Sun and Moon
tongue of the sun and moon.description: I can understand all spoken languages and all creatures with a language understand me

diamond soul.name: Diamond Soul
diamond soul.description: I am proficient with all saves; I can reroll a failed save once by spending 1 ki point
diamond soul.additional: 1 ki point to reroll failed saving throw

timeless body.name: Timeless Body
timeless body.description: I don't require food or water; I don't suffer age penalties and can't be aged magically

empty body.name: Empty Body
empty body.description: Be invisible and resist non-force damage for 1 min or cast Astral Projection on self
empty body.additional: Invisible: 4 ki point; Astral Projection: 8 ki points

perfect self.name: Perfect Self
perfect self.description: I regain 4 ki points if I have no more remaining when I roll initiative

Classes.name: Paladin
skills: Choose two from Athletics, Insight, Intimidation, Medicine, Persuasion, and Religion.
Classes.equipment: Paladin starting equipment: A martial weapon and a shield -or- two martial weapons; Five javelins -or- any simple melee weapon; A priest's pack -or- an explorer's pack; Chain mail and a holy symbol. Alternatively, choose 5d4 x 10 gp worth of starting equipment instead of both the class' and the background's starting equipment.

subclassfeature3.name: Channel Divinity: Sacred Weapon
subclassfeature3.description: As an action, for 1 minute, I add my Cha modifier to hit for one weapon I'm holding. It also counts as magical and emits bright light in a 20-ft radius and equal dim light

atkCalc: if (classes.known.paladin && classes.known.paladin.level > 2 && !isSpell && (/^(?=.*sacred)(?=.*weapon).*$/i).test(WeaponText)) { output.extraHit += What('Cha Mod'); };
If I include the words 'Sacred Weapon' in the name or description of a weapon, it gets my Charisma modifier added to its To Hit.

subclassfeature3.1.name: Channel Divinity: Turn the Unholy
subclassfeature3.1.description: As an action, all fiends/undead within 30 ft that can hear me must make a Wis save. If one of them fails this save, it is turned for 1 minute or until it takes damage. Turned: move away, never within 30 ft of me, no reactions or actions other than Dash. Turned: may Dodge instead of Dash when nowhere to move and unable to escape bonds

subclassfeature7.name: Aura of Devotion
subclassfeature7.description: While I'm conscious, allies within range and I can't be charmed

subclassfeature15.name: Purity of Spirit
subclassfeature15.description: I am always under the effect of a Protection from Evil and Good spell (PHB 270)

subclassfeature20.name: Holy Nimbus
subclassfeature20.description: As an action, I shine with a 30-ft radius bright light and equal dim light for 1 minute. If an enemy starts its turn in the bright light, it takes 10 radiant damage. For the duration, I have advantage on saves vs. spells cast by fiends and undead

subclassfeature3.name: Channel Divinity: Nature's Wrath
subclassfeature3.description:
As an action, a creature I can see within 10 ft must make a Str/Dex save (its choice)
   If it fails this save, it is restrained until it succeeds on a save at the end of its turn

subclassfeature3.1.name: Channel Divinity: Turn the Faithless
subclassfeature3.1.description:
As an action, all fey/fiends within 30 ft that can hear me must make a Wisdom save
   If one fails, it is turned for 1 minute or until it takes damage and must show true form
   Turned: move away, never within 30 ft of me, no reactions or actions other than Dash
   Turned: may Dodge instead of Dash when nowhere to move and unable to escape bonds

subclassfeature7.name: Aura of Warding
subclassfeature7.description: Allies within range and I have resistance to damage from spells

subclassfeature15.name: Undying Sentinel
subclassfeature15.description:
If dropped to 0 hit points and not killed outright, I can choose to stay at 1 hit point
   Additionally, I suffer no drawbacks of old age and can't be aged magically

subclassfeature20.name: Elder Champion
subclassfeature20.description:
As an action, I assume the form of a force of nature for 1 minute and gain benefits:
    - At the start of each of my turns, I regain 10 hit points
    - I can cast paladin spells with a casting time of 1 action as a bonus action instead
    - Enemies within 10 ft have disadv. on saves vs. my paladin spells and channel divinity

subclassfeature3.name: Channel Divinity: Abjure Enemy
subclassfeature3.description:
As an action, one creature within 60 ft that I can see me must make a Wisdom save
   If failed, it is frightened and its speed is 0 despite bonuses; if success, its speed is halved
   This lasts for 1 minute or until it takes damage; Undead/fiends have disadv. on save

subclassfeature3.1.name: Channel Divinity: Vow of Enmity
subclassfeature3.1.description:
As a bonus action, I utter a vow against a creature I can see within 10 ft
   I have advantage on attack rolls against it for 1 minute or until it is at 0 HP/unconscious

subclassfeature7.name: Relentless Avenger
subclassfeature7.description:
After I hit with an opportunity attack, I can move 1/2 my speed in the same reaction
   This movement doesn't provoke opportunity attacks

subclassfeature15.name: Soul of Vengeance
subclassfeature15.description:
When an enemy I have an active Vow of Enmity against makes an attack, I can react
   As a reaction, I can make a melee weapon attack against it if it is within range

subclassfeature20.name: Avenging Angel
subclassfeature20.description:
As an action, I gain a flying speed of 60 ft and a 30 ft aura of menace for 1 hour
   When a creature first enters or starts its turn in the aura, it must make a Wis save
   If failed, for 1 min or until it takes damage, it is frightened and attacks vs. it have adv.

subclassfeature3.name: Channel Divinity: Control Undead
subclassfeature3.description:
As an action, one undead (CR < paladin level) I can see in 30 ft must make a Wis save
If failed, it must obey my commands for 24 hours or until I use this on another

subclassfeature3.1.name: Channel Divinity: Dreadful Aspect
subclassfeature3.1.description:
As an action, anyone I choose within 30 ft that can see me must make a Wisdom save
If failed, it is frightened for 1 min or until it succeeds a save at the end of its turns
It can't save at the end of its turn if it's still within 30 ft of me

subclassfeature7.name: Aura of Hate
subclassfeature7.description:
Fiends/undead within range and I add my Cha mod as bonus on melee weapon damage
Multiple Auras of Hate don't stack; only the strongest applies

subclassfeature15.name: Supernatural Resistance
subclassfeature15.description: I have resistance to bludgeoning/piercing/slashing damage from nonmagical weapons

subclassfeature20.name: Dread Lord
subclassfeature20.description:
As an action, I gain a 30-ft aura of gloom that reduces bright light to dim for 1 min
If frightened of me, foes starting their turn in the aura take 4d10 psychic damage
Attacks vs. my allies and me inside the aura have disadvantage if attackers need sight
As a bonus action, I can make a melee spell attack vs. a target inside the aura
If this attack hits, it does 3d10 + Charisma modifier necrotic damage

subclassfeature3.name: Channel Divinity: Champion Challenge
subclassfeature3.description:
I can compel any chosen creatures within 30 ft of me to make a Wisdom save
If failed, a target is unable to willingly move more than 30 ft away from me
The effect ends if I'm incapacitated, die, or it is moved more than 30 ft away from me

subclassfeature3.1.name: Channel Divinity: Turn the Tide
subclassfeature3.1.description:
As a bonus action, any chosen creatures within 30 ft that can hear me regain HP
Each regain 1d6 + my Charisma modifier HP, up to half of its total HP

subclassfeature7.name: Divine Allegiance
subclassfeature7.description:
When a creature within 5 feet of me takes damage, I can substitute my HP for it
The creature takes no damage and I take all of it; this damage can't be prevented

subclassfeature15.name: Unyielding Spirit
subclassfeature15.description: I have advantage on saving throws against effects that paralyze or stun

subclassfeature20.name: Exalted Champion
subclassfeature20.description:
As an action, I gain the following benefits for 1 hour or until I'm incapacitated:
    - Resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical weapons
    - My allies within 30 ft of me and I have advantage on Wisdom and Death saves

subclassfeature3.name: Channel Divinity: Conquering Presence
subclassfeature3.description: As an action, all creatures of my choice within a 30-ft radius must make a Wisdom save. If failed, a target is frightened for 1 minute; It can save again at the end of each turn

subclassfeature3.1.name: Channel Divinity: Guided Strike
subclassfeature3.1.description: When I make an attack roll, I can add a +10 bonus to the roll after seeing the d20 roll

subclassfeature7.name: Aura of Conquest
subclassfeature7.description: Creatures that are frightened of me have their speed reduced to 0 while in my aura. They also take psychic damage whenever they start theirs turn within my aura

subclassfeature15.name: Scornful Rebuke
subclassfeature15.description: Whenever I'm hit with an attack while I'm not incapacitated, the attacker takes damage. This is psychic damage equal to my Charisma modifier (minimum of 1)

subclassfeature20.name: Invincible Conqueror
subclassfeature20.description:
As an action, I can gain the following benefits for 1 minute:
 - I have resistance to all damage
 - I can make an additional attack as part of my Attack action
 - My melee weapons score critical hits on a roll of 19 or 20

subclassfeature3.name: Channel Divinity: Emissary of Peace
subclassfeature3.description: As a bonus action, I grant myself +5 on Charisma (Persuasion) checks for 10 minutes

subclassfeature3.1.name: Channel Divinity: Rebuke the Violent
subclassfeature3.1.description: As a reaction after a creature within 30 ft attacks and damages another, I can rebuke it. It takes the same damage as it dealt but as radiant damage, with a Wis save to halve it

subclassfeature7.name: Aura of the Guardian
subclassfeature7.description: As a reaction when an ally within my aura takes damage, I instead take the damage. This damage can't be reduced in any way; Other effects might still apply to my ally

subclassfeature15.name: Protective Spirit
subclassfeature15.description: At the end of my turn when I'm below half HP and not incapacitated, I regain HP

subclassfeature20.name: Emissary of Redemption
subclassfeature20.description: When taking damage from a creature, I take only half and it takes the other half. This stops working on any that I attack or force to make a save, until I have a long rest

divine sense.name: Divine Sense
divine sense.description: As an action, I sense celestials/fiends/undead/consecrated/desecrated within 60 ft. Until the end of my next turn, I sense the type/location if it is not behind total cover

lay on hands.name: Lay on Hands
lay on hands.description: As an action, I can use points in my pool to heal a touched, living creature's hit points. I can neutralize poisons/diseases instead at a cost of 5 points per affliction

fighting style.name: Fighting Style
fighting style.description: Choose a Fighting Style for the paladin using the Choose Feature button above

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
spellcasting.description: I can cast prepared paladin spells, using Charisma as my spellcasting ability. I can use a holy symbol as a spellcasting focus

divine smite.name: Divine Smite
divine smite.description: When I hit someone in melee, I can expend spell slots to do 2d8 extra radiant damage. This increases by +1d8 for each spell slot level above 1st and +1d8 against undead/fiends

subclassfeature3.name: Sacred Oath
subclassfeature3.description: Choose a Sacred Oath you swear to and put it in the Class field on the first page. Choose Oath of the Ancients, Crown, Devotion, Vengeance, or become an Oathbreaker

divine health.name: Divine Health
divine health.description: I am immune to disease, thanks to the power of my faith

aura of protection.name: Aura of Protection
aura of protection.description: While I'm conscious, allies within range and I can add my Cha mod (min 1) to saves

addMod.text: While I'm conscious I can add my Charisma modifier (min 1) to all my saving throws.

aura of courage.name: Aura of Courage
aura of courage.description: While I'm conscious, allies within range and I can't be frightened

improved divine smite.name: Improved Divine Smite
improved divine smite.description: Whenever I hit a creature with a melee weapon, I do an extra 1d8 radiant damage

atkAdd: if (isMeleeWeapon) {fields.Description += (fields.Description ? '; ' : '') + '+1d8 Radiant damage'; };
With my melee weapon attacks I deal an extra 1d8 radiant damage.

cleansing touch.name: Cleansing Touch
cleansing touch.description: As an action, I can end one spell on me or another willing creature by touch

Classes.name: Ranger
skills: Choose three from Animal Handling, Athletics, Insight, Investigation, Nature, Perception, Stealth, and Survival
Choose one from Animal Handling, Athletics, Insight, Investigation, Nature, Perception, Stealth, and Survival
Classes.equipment: Ranger starting equipment: Scale mail -or- leather armor; Two shortswords -or- two simple melee weapons; A dungeoneer's pack -or- an explorer's pack; A longbow and a quiver of 20 arrows. Alternatively, choose 5d4 x 10 gp worth of starting equipment instead of both the class' and the background's starting equipment.

subclassfeature3.name: Hunter's Prey
subclassfeature3.description: Choose Colossus Slayer, Giant Killer, or Horde Breaker with the "Choose Feature" button

colossus slayer.name: Hunter's Prey: Colossus Slayer
colossus slayer.description: Once per turn, when hitting someone that is below max HP, I do an extra 1d8 damage

giant killer.name: Hunter's Prey: Giant Killer
giant killer.description: As a reaction, when a Large or larger enemy in 5 ft attacks me, I can attack it once

horde breaker.name: Hunter's Prey: Horde Breaker
horde breaker.description: Once per turn, when I hit a creature, I can make an attack vs. another within 5 ft of it

subclassfeature7.name: Defensive Tactics
subclassfeature7.description: Choose Feature button to choose Escape the Horde, Multiattack Defense, or Steel Will

escape the horde.name: Defensive Tactic: Escape the Horde
escape the horde.description: Creatures attacking me with opportunity attacks have disadvantage on the attack rolls

multiattack defense.name: Defensive Tactic: Multiattack Defense
multiattack defense.description: When a creature hits me, I gain +4 AC against that creature for the rest of the turn

steel will.name: Defensive Tactic: Steel Will
steel will.description: I have advantage on saves against being frightened

subclassfeature11.name: Multiattack
subclassfeature11.description: Choose Volley or Whirlwind Attack using the Choose Feature button above

volley.name: Multiattack: Volley
volley.description: As an action, I can make ranged attacks vs. all within a 10-ft radius of a point in range

whirlwind attack.name: Multiattack: Whirlwind Attack
whirlwind attack.description: As an action, I can make melee attacks vs. all creatures within 5 ft of me

subclassfeature15.name: Superior Hunter's Defense
subclassfeature15.description: Choose Feature button to choose Evasion, Stand Against the Tide, or Uncanny Dodge

evasion.name: Evasion
evasion.description: My Dexterity saves vs. areas of effect negate damage on success and halve it on failure

text: Dex save vs. area effects: fail ― half dmg, success ― no dmg

stand against the tide.name: Stand Against the Tide
stand against the tide.description: When a creature misses me with a melee attack, I can use my reaction on the attack. I force the attacker to repeat it vs. another (not attacker) of my choice within range

uncanny dodge.name: Uncanny Dodge
uncanny dodge.description: As a reaction, I halve the damage of an attack from an attacker that I can see

subclassfeature3.name: Ranger's Companion
subclassfeature3.description:
It adds my proficiency bonus to AC, attacks, damage, and save/skill proficiencies
   Its Hit Point maximum equals four times my ranger level if higher than its normal HP
   It takes a turn on my initiative; It only takes an action if I command it to
   As an action, I can have it do an Attack/Dash/Disengage/Dodge/Help action on its turn
   Can attack while commanding with Extra Attack; Order movement at no action cost
subclassfeature3.additional: 1/4 CR up to medium sized beast

subclassfeature7.name: Exceptional Training
subclassfeature7.description: As a bonus action, I can have my beast Dash/Disengage/Dodge/Help on its turn

subclassfeature11.name: Bestial Fury
subclassfeature11.description: When I command my beast to use the Attack action, it can attack twice on its turn

subclassfeature15.name: Share Spells
subclassfeature15.description: When I cast a spell on myself, I can have it also affect my beast if it is within 30 ft

subclassfeature3.name: Dread Ambusher
subclassfeature3.description: I can add my Wisdom modifier to my initiative rolls. In the first turn of combat I get +10 ft speed and an extra attack with the Attack action. If I take the Attack action and that extra attack hits, it does +1d8 damage

addMod.text: I can add my Wisdom modifier to my initiative rolls.

subclassfeature3.1.name: Gloom Stalker Magic
subclassfeature3.1.description: I add a spell to my known spells at level 3, 5, 9, 13, and 15. These count as ranger spells, but do not count against the number of spells I can know

subclassfeature3.2.name: Umbral Sight
subclassfeature3.2.description: I gain 60 ft darkvision, or add 30 ft to darkvision if I already had it because of my race. When I'm in darkness, others gain no benefit from darkvision to detect me

subclassfeature7.name: Iron Mind
subclassfeature7.description: I gain proficiency with Wis saves, or if I'm already proficient, either Int or Cha saves

subclassfeature11.name: Stalker's Flurry
subclassfeature11.description: Once on each of my turns when I miss a weapon attack, I can make an extra attack

subclassfeature15.name: Shadowy Dodge
subclassfeature15.description: As a reaction when I'm attacked without adv., I can impose disadv. on the attack roll

subclassfeature3.name: Detect Portal
subclassfeature3.description: As an action, I sense the distance and direction to the closest planar portal within 1 mile

subclassfeature3.1.name: Horizon Walker Magic
subclassfeature3.1.description: I add a spell to my known spells at level 3, 5, 9, 13, and 15. These count as ranger spells, but do not count against the number of spells I can know

subclassfeature3.2.name: Planar Warrior
subclassfeature3.2.description: As a bonus action, I choose one creature that I can see within 30 ft of me. All damage from my first weapon attack that hits it on this turn becomes force damage. In addition, that first hit does extra damage

subclassfeature7.name: Ethereal Step
subclassfeature7.description: As a bonus action, I can cast the Etherealness spell, which lasts until the end of my turn

subclassfeature11.name: Distant Strike
subclassfeature11.description: With the Attack action, I can teleport 10 ft before each attack, to a place I can see. If I attack two different creatures with this action, I get an extra attack against a third

subclassfeature15.name: Spectral Defense
subclassfeature15.description: As a reaction when an attack damages me, I can give myself resistance vs. that attack

subclassfeature3.name: Hunter's Sense
subclassfeature3.description: As an action, I learn vulnerabilities/immunities/resistances of a target I see within 60 ft. If it is protected from divination magic, I sense it has none of these

subclassfeature3.1.name: Monster Slayer Magic
subclassfeature3.1.description: I get bonus spells known, which do not count against the number of spells I can know

subclassfeature3.2.name: Slayer's Prey
subclassfeature3.2.description: As a bonus action, I designate a creature I see within 60 ft; This lasts until I do this again. My first hit to the target with a weapon attack on each of my turns does +1d6 damage

subclassfeature7.name: Supernatural Defense
subclassfeature7.description: I add 1d6 to saving throws the current target of my Slayer's Prey forces me to make. In addition, I also add 1d6 to checks to escape that target's grapple

subclassfeature11.name: Magic-User's Nemesis
subclassfeature11.description: As a reaction when I see someone within 60 ft casting a spell or teleporting, I can foil it. The target must make a Wisdom save or have its spell or teleport fail and be wasted

subclassfeature15.name: Slayer's Counter
subclassfeature15.description: As a reaction when the target of my Slayer's Prey has me make a save, I can attack it. I can make one weapon attack; If this hits, I automatically succeed on the saving throw

favored enemy.name: Favored Enemy
favored enemy.description: Use the Choose Feature button above to add a favored enemy to the third page. When selecting a favored enemy, I also learn one of the languages it speaks. I have adv. on Wis (Survival) checks to track and Int checks to recall info about them

natural explorer.name: Natural Explorer
natural explorer.description: Use the Choose Feature button above to add a favored terrain to the third page

arctic.name: Arctic
arctic.description: I can double my proficiency bonus for Int/Wis checks concerning arctic terrain. While traveling for an hour or more in arctic terrain I gain the following benefits: My allies and I are not slowed by difficult terrain and can't get lost except by magic. I am alert to danger even when doing something else; I forage twice as much food. If alone (or alone with beast companion), I can move stealthily at my normal pace. When tracking, I also learn the exact number, size, and time since passing

coast.name: Coast
coast.description: I can double my proficiency bonus for Int/Wis checks concerning coast terrain. While traveling for an hour or more in coast terrain I gain the following benefits: My allies and I are not slowed by difficult terrain and can't get lost except by magic. I am alert to danger even when doing something else; I forage twice as much food. If alone (or alone with beast companion), I can move stealthily at my normal pace. When tracking, I also learn the exact number, size, and time since passing

desert.name: Desert
desert.description: I can double my proficiency bonus for Int/Wis checks concerning desert terrain. While traveling for an hour or more in desert terrain I gain the following benefits: My allies and I are not slowed by difficult terrain and can't get lost except by magic; I am alert to danger even when doing something else; I forage twice as much food; If alone (or alone with beast companion), I can move stealthily at my normal pace; When tracking, I also learn the exact number, size, and time since passing

forest.name: Forest
forest.description: I can double my proficiency bonus for Int/Wis checks concerning forest terrain. While traveling for an hour or more in forest terrain I gain the following benefits: My allies and I are not slowed by difficult terrain and can't get lost except by magic; I am alert to danger even when doing something else; I forage twice as much food; If alone (or alone with beast companion), I can move stealthily at my normal pace; When tracking, I also learn the exact number, size, and time since passing

grassland.name: Grassland
grassland.description: I can double my proficiency bonus for Int/Wis checks concerning grassland terrain. While traveling for an hour or more in grassland terrain I gain the following benefits: My allies and I are not slowed by difficult terrain and can't get lost except by magic; I am alert to danger even when doing something else; I forage twice as much food; If alone (or alone with beast companion), I can move stealthily at my normal pace; When tracking, I also learn the exact number, size, and time since passing

mountain.name: Mountain
mountain.description: I can double my proficiency bonus for Int/Wis checks concerning mountain terrain. While traveling for an hour or more in mountain terrain I gain the following benefits: My allies and I are not slowed by difficult terrain and can't get lost except by magic; I am alert to danger even when doing something else; I forage twice as much food; If alone (or alone with beast companion), I can move stealthily at my normal pace; When tracking, I also learn the exact number, size, and time since passing

swamp.name: Swamp
swamp.description: I can double my proficiency bonus for Int/Wis checks concerning swamp terrain. While traveling for an hour or more in swamp terrain I gain the following benefits: My allies and I are not slowed by difficult terrain and can't get lost except by magic; I am alert to danger even when doing something else; I forage twice as much food; If alone (or alone with beast companion), I can move stealthily at my normal pace; When tracking, I also learn the exact number, size, and time since passing

underdark.name: Underdark
underdark.description: I can double my proficiency bonus for Int/Wis checks concerning underdark terrain. While traveling for an hour or more in underdark terrain I gain the following benefits: My allies and I are not slowed by difficult terrain and can't get lost except by magic; I am alert to danger even when doing something else; I forage twice as much food; If alone (or alone with beast companion), I can move stealthily at my normal pace; When tracking, I also learn the exact number, size, and time since passing

fighting style.name: Fighting Style
fighting style.description: Choose a Fighting Style for the ranger using the Choose Feature button above

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
spellcasting.description: I can cast ranger spells that I know, using Wisdom as my spellcasting ability

subclassfeature3.name: Ranger Archetype
subclassfeature3.description: Choose a Ranger Archetype you strive to emulate and put it in the Class field. Choose either Beast Master or Hunter

primeval awareness.name: Primeval Awareness
primeval awareness.description: As an action, I can use a spell slot to focus my awareness for 1 min per spell slot level. Out to 1 mile (6 in favored terrain), I sense if certain types of creatures are present

land's stride.name: Land's Stride
land's stride.description: I can travel through nonmagical, difficult terrain without penalty. I have advantage on saves vs. plants that impede movement by magical influence

hide in plain sight.name: Hide in Plain Sight
hide in plain sight.description: I can hide with +10 to Dex (Stealth) after spending 1 minute creating camouflage. Once I move or take an action or a reaction, the benefit is lost

vanish.name: Vanish
vanish.description: I can't be nonmagically tracked if I don't want to be and can Hide as a bonus action

feral senses.name: Feral Senses
feral senses.description: When not blinded or deafened, I'm aware of invisible, non-hidden creatures in 30 ft. I don't have disadvantage when attacking creatures I am aware of but can't see

foe slayer.name: Foe Slayer
foe slayer.description: Once per turn, I can add Wis mod to the attack or damage roll vs. favored enemy

Classes.name: Rogue
skills: Choose four from Acrobatics, Athletics, Deception, Insight, Intimidation, Investigation, Perception, Performance, Persuasion, Sleight of Hand, and Stealth.
Choose one from Acrobatics, Athletics, Deception, Insight, Intimidation, Investigation, Perception, Performance, Persuasion, Sleight of Hand, and Stealth.
Classes.equipment: Rogue starting equipment: A rapier -or- a shortsword; A shortbow and a quiver of 20 arrows -or- a shortswords; A burglar's pack -or- dungeoneer's pack -or- an explorer's pack; Leather armor, two daggers, and thieves' tools. Alternatively, choose 4d4 x 10 gp worth of starting equipment instead of both the class' and the background's starting equipment.

subclassfeature3.name: Fast Hands
subclassfeature3.description: As a bonus action, I can do one of the following: Make a Dexterity (Sleight of Hand) check; Use my thieves' tools to disarm a trap or open a lock; Take the Use an Object action

subclassfeature3.1.name: Second-Story Work
subclassfeature3.1.description: I climb at my normal speed; I add my Dex modifier to the distance of a running jump

subclassfeature9.name: Supreme Sneak
subclassfeature9.description: I have advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks when moving no more than half speed

subclassfeature13.name: Use Magic Device
subclassfeature13.description: I can use magic items even if I don't meet the class, race, and/or level requirements

subclassfeature17.name: Thief's Reflexes
subclassfeature17.description: Unless surprised, I can take two turns on the first round of any combat. The first turn is at my regular initiative, and the second is at my initiative - 10

subclassfeature3.name: Spellcasting
subclassfeature3.description: I can cast known wizard cantrips/spells, using Intelligence as my spellcasting ability

subclassfeature3.1.name: Mage Hand Legerdemain
subclassfeature3.1.description:
As a bonus action, I can direct my Mage Hand
   With a Dex (Sleight of Hand) vs. Wis (Perception) checks, I can do so discreetly
   I can make it invisible and perform the following tasks:
    - Stow/retrieve an object the hand is holding in a container worn/carried by another
    - Use thieves' tools to pick locks and disarm traps at range

subclassfeature9.name: Magical Ambush
subclassfeature9.description: When I cast a spell while hidden, the target(s) have disadvantage against that spell

subclassfeature13.name: Versatile Trickster
subclassfeature13.description: As a bonus action, gain adv. on attacks this turn on creature within 5 ft of Mage Hand

subclassfeature17.name: Spell Thief
subclassfeature17.description:
As a reaction, after a spell is cast at me, I can try to negate and steal it
   The caster makes a save against my spell DC with his/her spellcasting ability
   On failure, the caster forgets how to cast that spell for eight hours
   If I have a spell slot of a high enough level for it, I learn how to cast it during this time

subclassfeature3.name: Bonus Proficiencies
subclassfeature3.description: I am proficient with disguise kits and poisoner's kits

subclassfeature3.1.name: Assassinate
subclassfeature3.1.description:
I have adv. on attack rolls against creatures that have not taken a turn in combat yet
   Any hit I score against a creature that is surprised is a critical hit

subclassfeature9.name: Infiltration Expertise
subclassfeature9.description: I can create false identities in 7 days for 25 gp

subclassfeature13.name: Imposter
subclassfeature13.description:
After 3 hours of studying a person, I can mimic speech, writing, and behavior
   I have advantage on Charisma (Deception) checks to maintain this ruse

subclassfeature17.name: Death Strike
subclassfeature17.description: When I hit a surprised creature, it must make a Con save or take double damage
subclassfeature17.additional: Save DC: 8 + Dex mod + Proficiency bonus

subclassfeature3.name: Master of Intrigue
subclassfeature3.description: I gain proficiency with disguise kits, forgery kits, one gaming set, and two languages. I can mimic speech patterns and accents if I've heard them for at least 1 minute

subclassfeature3.1.name: Master of Tactics
subclassfeature3.1.description: I can use the Help action as a bonus action. This even works if the ally attacks a target within 30 ft of me that can see or hear me

subclassfeature9.name: Insightful Manipulator
subclassfeature9.description: By spending 1 minute observing/interacting outside of combat I can learn capabilities. The DM tells me if the target is my equal, superior, or inferior in regard to two things: - Intelligence score    - Wisdom score    - Charisma score    - Class levels (if any)

subclassfeature13.name: Misdirection
subclassfeature13.description: As a reaction, I can redirect an attack meant for me to a creature within 5 ft of me. This only works if the creature is providing me with cover against the attack

subclassfeature17.name: Soul of Deceit
subclassfeature17.description: My thoughts can't be read by telepathy or similar means; I can project false thoughts. For that, I must pass a Cha (Deception) vs. Wis (Insight) check to fool the mind reader. Magic always determines I'm truthful; I can't be magically compelled to tell the truth

subclassfeature3.name: Fancy Footwork
subclassfeature3.description: Enemies I make a melee attack against in my turn can't use opportunity attacks on me. This lasts until the end of my current turn

subclassfeature3.1.name: Rakish Audacity
subclassfeature3.1.description: I don't need advantage to sneak attack if my target is the only one within 5 ft of me. I still can't sneak attack if I have disadv.; I add my Charisma modifier to initiative rolls

addMod.text: I can add my Charisma modifier to initiative rolls.

subclassfeature9.name: Panache
subclassfeature9.description:
As an action, I can beguile a creature that hears and understands me, for 1 minute. It must succeed a Wis (Insight) check opposed by my Cha (Persuasion) or be affected as:
-A hostile target gains disadv. on attacks and can't do opportunity attacks vs. not-me. This effect ends if an ally attacks or casts a spell vs. it, or if it and I are 60 ft apart
-Targets that are not hostile are charmed and regard me as a friendly acquaintance. This effect ends if me or an ally do anything harmful to it

subclassfeature13.name: Elegant Maneuver
subclassfeature13.description: As a bonus action, I can gain adv. on my next Dex (Acrobatics) or Str (Athletics) check

subclassfeature17.name: Master Duelist
subclassfeature17.description: Once per short rest, when I miss with an attack roll, I can roll again with advantage

subclassfeature3.name: Ear for Deceit
subclassfeature3.description: For Wis (Insight) to sense if another is lying, I can treat a die roll of 7 or lower as an 8

subclassfeature3.1.name: Eye for Detail
subclassfeature3.1.description:
As a bonus action, I can do either of the following:
 - Make a Wisdom (Perception) check to spot a hidden creature or object
 - Make an Intelligence (Investigation) check to uncover or decipher clues

subclassfeature3.2.name: Insightful Fighting
subclassfeature3.2.description: As a bonus action, I can decipher the tactics of another I can see that's not incapacitated. I have to make a Wisdom (Insight) check vs. the target's Charisma (Deception) check. If I succeed, I can use my sneak attack on it even if I don't have adv. (but not if disadv.). This benefit lasts for 1 minute or until I successfully use Insightful Fighting again

subclassfeature9.name: Steady Eye
subclassfeature9.description: I'm more perceptive when I don't move more than half my speed in the same turn. If so, I gain adv. on Wis (Perception) and Int (Investigation) checks during that turn

subclassfeature13.name: Unerring Eye
subclassfeature13.description: As an action, I can sense magical deceptions within 30 feet of me, but not what it does. I learn the presence of illusions, shapechanged creatures, or magic designed to deceive

subclassfeature17.name: Eye for Weakness
subclassfeature17.description: While my Insightful Fighting is active, I add 3d6 to sneak attacks against that target

subclassfeature3.name: Skirmisher
subclassfeature3.description: As a reaction when a hostile ends its turn within 5 ft of me, I can move half my speed

subclassfeature3.1.name: Survivalist
subclassfeature3.1.description: I gain proficiency and expertise with the Nature and Survival skills
subclassfeature3.1.skillstxt: Proficiency and expertise with Nature and Survival.
subclassfeature3.1.eval: AddSkillProf('Nature', true, true); AddSkillProf('Survival', true, true);
subclassfeature3.1.removeeval: AddSkillProf('Nature', false, true); AddSkillProf('Survival', false, true);

subclassfeature9.name: Superior Mobility
subclassfeature9.description: I gain +10 ft to my walking speed (and swimming/climbing speed, if applicable)

subclassfeature13.name: Ambush Master
subclassfeature13.description: I gain advantage on Initiative rolls. The first creature I hit in the first round of combat becomes an easy target. Until the start of my next turn, all attacks against the target have advantage
subclassfeature13.eval: Checkbox('Init Adv', true, 'Advantage to Initiative checks was gained from Scout (Ambush Master)');

subclassfeature17.name: Sudden Strike
subclassfeature17.description: With the Attack action, I can make one additional attack as a bonus action. This attack can benefit from my Sneak Attack even if I already used it this turn. However, I still can't use Sneak Attack on a single target more than once per turn

expertise.name: Expertise
expertise.description: I gain expertise with two skills/thieves' tools I am proficient with; two more at 6th level
expertise.skillstxt: Choose any two skill proficiencies and/or thieves' tools, and two more at 6th level.

sneak attack.name: Sneak Attack
sneak attack.description: Once per turn, I can add damage to finesse/ranged attack if I have advantage. I don't need adv. if a conscious ally is within 5 ft of the target and I don't have disadv.

atkAdd: if (classes.known.rogue && classes.known.rogue.level && !isSpell && ((/\bfinesse\b/i).test(fields.Description) || isRangedWeapon)) {var sneakAtk = Math.ceil(classes.known.rogue.level / 2); fields.Description += (fields.Description ? '; ' : '') + 'Sneak attack ' + sneakAtk + 'd6'; };
Once per turn, when I attack with a ranged or finesse weapon while I have advantage or an conscious ally is within 5 ft of the target, I can add my sneak attack damage to the attack.

thieves cant.name: Thieves' Cant
thieves cant.description: I know the secret rogue language that I can use to convey messages inconspicuously

cunning action.name: Cunning Action
cunning action.description: I can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action

subclassfeature3.name: Roguish Archetype
subclassfeature3.description: Choose a Roguish Archetype you strive to emulate and put it in the Class field. Choose either Arcane Trickster, Assassin, Mastermind, Swashbuckler, or Thief

uncanny dodge.name: Uncanny Dodge
uncanny dodge.description: As a reaction, I halve the damage of an attack from an attacker that I can see

evasion.name: Evasion
evasion.description: My Dexterity saves vs. areas of effect negate damage on success and halve it on failure

text: Dex save vs. area effects: fail ― half dmg, success ― no dmg

reliable talent.name: Reliable Talent
reliable talent.description: If I make an ability check where I add my proficiency bonus, rolls of 9 or lower are 10

blindsense.name: Blindsense
blindsense.description: With my hearing, I can locate hidden or invisible creatures that are within 10 ft of me

slippery mind.name: Slippery Mind
slippery mind.description: I am proficient with Wisdom saving throws

elusive.name: Elusive
elusive.description: Attackers do not gain advantage on attacks vs. me, unless I am incapacitated

stroke of luck.name: Stroke of Luck
stroke of luck.description: I can turn a missed attack into a hit or a failed ability check into a natural 20

Classes.name: Sorcerer
skills: Choose two from Arcana, Deception, Insight, Intimidation, Persuasion, and Religion.
Classes.equipment: Sorcerer starting equipment: A light crossbow and 20 bolts -or- any simple weapon; A component pouch -or- an arcane focus; A dungeoneer's pack -or- an explorer's pack; Two daggers. Alternatively, choose 3d4 x 10 gp worth of starting equipment instead of both the class' and the background's starting equipment.

subclassfeature1.name: Dragon Ancestor
subclassfeature1.description: Choose a Dragon Ancestor using the Choose Feature button above. When interacting with dragons, if I can add my proficiency bonus, I can double it

black dragon ancestor.name: Black Dragon Ancestor
black dragon ancestor.description: I have draconic ancestry with black dragons, which are affiliated with acid damage. When interacting with dragons, if I can add my proficiency bonus, I can double it
black dragon ancestor.eval: var ToAdd = ['sorcerer', 'subclassfeature6', 'acid']; if (classes.known.sorcerer.level >= 6 && What('Class Features Remember').indexOf(ToAdd.toString()) === -1) {ClassFeatureOptions(ToAdd)};

blue dragon ancestor.name: Blue Dragon Ancestor
blue dragon ancestor.description: I have draconic ancestry with blue dragons, which are affiliated with lightning damage. When interacting with dragons, if I can add my proficiency bonus, I can double it

brass dragon ancestor.name: Brass Dragon Ancestor
brass dragon ancestor.description: I have draconic ancestry with brass dragons, which are affiliated with fire damage. When interacting with dragons, if I can add my proficiency bonus, I can double it
brass dragon ancestor.eval: var ToAdd = ['sorcerer', 'subclassfeature6', 'fire']; if (classes.known.sorcerer.level >= 6 && What('Class Features Remember').indexOf(ToAdd.toString()) === -1) {ClassFeatureOptions(ToAdd)};

bronze dragon ancestor.name: Bronze Dragon Ancestor
bronze dragon ancestor.description: I have draconic ancestry with bronze dragons, which are affiliated with lightning dmg. When interacting with dragons, if I can add my proficiency bonus, I can double it
bronze dragon ancestor.eval: var ToAdd = ['sorcerer', 'subclassfeature6', 'lightning']; if (classes.known.sorcerer.level >= 6 && What('Class Features Remember').indexOf(ToAdd.toString()) === -1) {ClassFeatureOptions(ToAdd)};

copper dragon ancestor.name: Copper Dragon Ancestor
copper dragon ancestor.description: I have draconic ancestry with copper dragons, which are affiliated with acid damage. When interacting with dragons, if I can add my proficiency bonus, I can double it
copper dragon ancestor.eval: var ToAdd = ['sorcerer', 'subclassfeature6', 'acid']; if (classes.known.sorcerer.level >= 6 && What('Class Features Remember').indexOf(ToAdd.toString()) === -1) {ClassFeatureOptions(ToAdd)};

gold dragon ancestor.name: Gold Dragon Ancestor
gold dragon ancestor.description: I have draconic ancestry with gold dragons, which are affiliated with fire damage. When interacting with dragons, if I can add my proficiency bonus, I can double it
gold dragon ancestor.eval: var ToAdd = ['sorcerer', 'subclassfeature6', 'fire']; if (classes.known.sorcerer.level >= 6 && What('Class Features Remember').indexOf(ToAdd.toString()) === -1) {ClassFeatureOptions(ToAdd)};

green dragon ancestor.name: Green Dragon Ancestor
green dragon ancestor.description: I have draconic ancestry with green dragons, which are affiliated with poison damage. When interacting with dragons, if I can add my proficiency bonus, I can double it
green dragon ancestor.eval: var ToAdd = ['sorcerer', 'subclassfeature6', 'poison']; if (classes.known.sorcerer.level >= 6 && What('Class Features Remember').indexOf(ToAdd.toString()) === -1) {ClassFeatureOptions(ToAdd)};

red dragon ancestor.name: Red Dragon Ancestor
red dragon ancestor.description: I have draconic ancestry with red dragons, which are affiliated with fire damage. When interacting with dragons, if I can add my proficiency bonus, I can double it
red dragon ancestor.eval: var ToAdd = ['sorcerer', 'subclassfeature6', 'fire']; if (classes.known.sorcerer.level >= 6 && What('Class Features Remember').indexOf(ToAdd.toString()) === -1) {ClassFeatureOptions(ToAdd)};

silver dragon ancestor.name: Silver Dragon Ancestor
silver dragon ancestor.description: I have draconic ancestry with silver dragons, which are affiliated with cold damage. When interacting with dragons, if I can add my proficiency bonus, I can double it
silver dragon ancestor.eval: var ToAdd = ['sorcerer', 'subclassfeature6', 'cold']; if (classes.known.sorcerer.level >= 6 && What('Class Features Remember').indexOf(ToAdd.toString()) === -1) {ClassFeatureOptions(ToAdd)};

white dragon ancestor.name: White Dragon Ancestor
white dragon ancestor.description: I have draconic ancestry with white dragons, which are affiliated with cold damage. When interacting with dragons, if I can add my proficiency bonus, I can double it
white dragon ancestor.eval: var ToAdd = ['sorcerer', 'subclassfeature6', 'cold']; if (classes.known.sorcerer.level >= 6 && What('Class Features Remember').indexOf(ToAdd.toString()) === -1) {ClassFeatureOptions(ToAdd)};

subclassfeature1.1.name: Draconic Resilience
subclassfeature1.1.description: When I am not wearing armor, my AC is 13 + Dexterity modifier. My hit point maximum increases by an amount equal to my sorcerer level

calcChanges.hp: if (classes.known.sorcerer) {extrahp += classes.known.sorcerer.level; extrastring += '\n + ' + classes.known.sorcerer.level + ' from Draconic Resilience (Sorcerer)'; };

subclassfeature6.name: Elemental Affinity
subclassfeature6.description: Choose a Dragon Ancestor using the Choose Feature button above. I add Cha mod for spell damage if matching my dragon ancestor's affiliated type. I can spend 1 sorcery point to gain resistance to my dragon ancestor's affiliated type

acid.name: Acid Elemental Affinity
acid.description: [1 sorcery point] I add my Charisma modifier to one damage roll of a spell if it does acid damage. When I do this, I can spend 1 sorcery point to gain acid resistance for 1 hour

atkCalc: if (classes.known.sorcerer && classes.known.sorcerer.level > 5 && isSpell && (/acid/i).test(fields.Damage_Type)) { output.extraDmg += What('Cha Mod'); };
Cantrips and spell that deal acid damage get my Charisma modifier added to their Damage.

cold.name: Cold Elemental Affinity
cold.description: [1 sorcery point] I add my Charisma modifier to one damage roll of a spell if it does cold damage. When I do this, I can spend 1 sorcery point to gain cold resistance for 1 hour

atkCalc: if (classes.known.sorcerer && classes.known.sorcerer.level > 5 && isSpell && (/cold/i).test(fields.Damage_Type)) { output.extraDmg += What('Cha Mod'); };
Cantrips and spell that deal cold damage get my Charisma modifier added to their Damage.

fire.name: Fire Elemental Affinity
fire.description: [1 sorcery point] I add my Charisma modifier to one damage roll of a spell if it does fire damage. When I do this, I can spend 1 sorcery point to gain fire resistance for 1 hour

atkCalc: if (classes.known.sorcerer && classes.known.sorcerer.level > 5 && isSpell && (/fire/i).test(fields.Damage_Type)) { output.extraDmg += What('Cha Mod'); };
Cantrips and spell that deal fire damage get my Charisma modifier added to their Damage.

lightning.name: Lightning Elemental Affinity
lightning.description: [1 sorcery point] I add my Charisma modifier to one damage roll of a spell if it does lightning damage. When I do this, I can spend 1 sorcery point to gain lightning resistance for 1 hour

atkCalc: if (classes.known.sorcerer && classes.known.sorcerer.level > 5 && isSpell && (/lightning/i).test(fields.Damage_Type)) { output.extraDmg += What('Cha Mod'); };
Cantrips and spell that deal lightning damage get my Charisma modifier added to their Damage.

poison.name: Poison Elemental Affinity
poison.description: [1 sorcery point] I add my Charisma modifier to one damage roll of a spell if it does poison damage. When I do this, I can spend 1 sorcery point to gain poison resistance for 1 hour

atkCalc: if (classes.known.sorcerer && classes.known.sorcerer.level > 5 && isSpell && (/poison/i).test(fields.Damage_Type)) { output.extraDmg += What('Cha Mod'); };
Cantrips and spell that deal poison damage get my Charisma modifier added to their Damage.

subclassfeature6.eval: if (FeaChoice === '') {var CFrem = What('Class Features Remember'); var tReg = /.*?sorcerer,subclassfeature1,((black|blue|brass|bronze|copper|gold|green|red|silver|white) dragon ancestor).*/i; if ((tReg).test(CFrem)) {FeaChoice = CurrentClasses.sorcerer.features.subclassfeature1[CFrem.replace(tReg, '$1')].dragonElement; AddString('Class Features Remember', 'sorcerer,subclassfeature6,' + FeaChoice, false);};};

subclassfeature14.name: Dragon Wings
subclassfeature14.description: As a bonus action, unless armor is in the way, I can sprout dragon wings from my back. I gain a fly speed equal to my current speed until I dismiss the wings as a bonus action

subclassfeature18.name: Draconic Presence
subclassfeature18.description: As an action, I create 60-ft radius aura of awe/fear for concentration up to 1 minute. All hostiles in this aura must make a Wis save or be charmed (awe) or frightened (fear). They make their saves at the beginning of their turns. A creature that succeeds on the save is immune to my aura for 24 hours

subclassfeature1.name: Wild Magic Surge
subclassfeature1.description:
Wild Magic Surges happen 5% of the time that I cast a sorcerer spell. This doesn't happen with cantrips and I only take this chance if the DM tells me to

◆ Wild Magic Surge Table (Wild Magic 1, PHB 104) [results 01-50]
d100  Effect
01-02 Roll on this table at the start of each of your turns for the next minute, ignoring this result on subsequent rolls.
03-04 For the next minute, you can see any invisible creature if you have line of sight to it.
05-06 A modron chosen and controlled by the DM appears in an unoccupied space within 5 ft of you, then disappears 1 minute later.
07-08 You cast fireball as a 3rd-level spell centered on yourself.
09-10 You cast magic missile as a 5th-level spell.
11-12 Roll a d10. Your height changes by a number of inches equal to the roll. If the roll is odd, you shrink. If the roll is even, you grow.
13-14 You cast confusion centered on yourself.
15-16 For the next minute, you regain 5 hit points at the start of each of your turns.
17-18 You grow a long beard made of feathers that remains until you sneeze, at which point the feathers explode out from your face.
19-20 You cast grease centered on yourself.
21-22 Creatures have disadvantage on saving throws against the next spell you cast in the next minute that involves a saving throw.
23-24 Your skin turns a vibrant shade of blue. A remove curse spell can end this effect.
25-26 An eye appears on your forehead for the next minute.
27-28 For the next minute, all your spells with a casting time feet of 1 action have a casting time of 1 bonus action.
29-30 You teleport up to 60 ft to an unoccupied space of your choice that you can see.
31-32 You are transported to the Astral Plane until the end of your next turn, after which time you return to the space you previously occupied or the nearest unoccupied space if that space is occupied.
33-34 Maximize the damage of the next damaging spell you cast within the next minute.
35-36 Roll a d10. Your age changes by a number of years equal to the roll. If the roll is odd, you get younger (minimum 1 year old). If the roll is even, you get older.
37-38 1d6 flumphs controlled by the DM appear in unoccupied spaces within 60 ft of you and are frightened of you. They vanish after 1 minute.
39-40 You regain 2d10 hit points.
41-42 You turn into a potted plant until the start of your next turn. While a plant, you are incapacitated and have vulnerability to all damage. If you drop to 0 hit points, your pot breaks, and your form reverts.
43-44 For the next minute, you can teleport up to 20 ft as a bonus action on each of your turns.
45-46 You cast levitate on yourself.
47-48 A unicorn controlled by the DM appears in a space within 5 ft of you, then disappears 1 minute later.
49-50 You can't speak for the next minute. Whenever you try, pink bubbles float out of your mouth.
51-52 A spectral shield hovers near you for the next minute, granting you a +2 bonus to AC and immunity to magic missile.
53-54 You are immune to being intoxicated by alcohol for the next 5d6 days.
55-56 Your hair falls out but grows back within 24 hours.
57-58 For the next minute, any flammable object you touch that isn't being worn or carried by another creature bursts into flame.
59-60 You regain your lowest-level expended spell slot.
61-62 For the next minute, you must shout when you speak.
63-64 You cast fog cloud centered on yourself.
65-66 Up to three creatures you choose within 30 ft of you take 4d10 lightning damage.
67-68 You are frightened by the nearest creature until the end of your next turn.
69-70 Each creature within 30 ft of you becomes invisible for the next minute. The invisibility ends on a creature when it attacks or casts a spell.
71-72 You gain resistance to all damage for the next minute.
73-74 A random creature within 60 ft of you becomes poisoned for 1d4 hours.
75-76 You glow with bright light in a 30-ft radius for the next minute. Any creature that ends its turn within 5 ft of you is blinded until the end of its next turn.
79-80 Illusory butterflies and flower petals flutter in the air within 10 ft of you for the next minute.
77-78 You cast polymorph on yourself. If you fail the saving throw, you turn into a sheep for the spell's duration.
81-82 You can take one additional action immediately.
83-84 Each creature within 30 ft of you takes 1d10 necrotic damage. You regain hit points equal to the sum of the necrotic damage dealt.
85-86 You cast mirror image.
87-88 You cast fly on a random creature within 60 ft of you.
89-90 You become invisible for the next minute. During that time, other creatures can't hear you. The invisibility ends if you attack or cast a spell.
91-92 If you die within the next minute, you immediately come back to life as if by the reincarnate spell.
93-94 Your size increases by one size category for the next minute.
95-96 You and all creatures within 30 ft of you gain vulnerability to piercing damage for the next minute.
97-98 You are surrounded by faint, ethereal music for the next minute.
99-100 You regain all expended sorcery points.

subclassfeature1.1.name: Tides of Chaos
subclassfeature1.1.description:
I can gain advantage on either one attack roll, ability check, or saving throw
   After I cast a 1st-level or higher sorcerer spell, the DM can impose a Wild Magic Surge
   After I roll on the Wild Magic Surge table, I regain my use of Tides of Chaos

subclassfeature6.name: Bend Luck
subclassfeature6.description: As a reaction, I can add/subtract 1d4 from another's attack roll, ability check, or save

subclassfeature14.name: Controlled Chaos
subclassfeature14.description: Whenever I roll on the Wild Magic Surge table, I can roll twice and use either result

subclassfeature18.name: Spell Bombardment
subclassfeature18.description:
Once per turn, when I roll spell damage, I can take one damage die that rolled max
   I can then roll this die again and add it to the spell's damage

subclassfeature1.name: Wind Speaker
subclassfeature1.description: I can speak, read, and write Primordial (and its dialects Aquan, Auran, Ignan, Terran)

subclassfeature1.1.name: Tempestuous Magic
subclassfeature1.1.description: As a bonus action, after casting a 1st-level or higher spell, I can control elemental air. I can use this control to fly up to 10 feet without provoking opportunity attacks

subclassfeature6.name: Heart of the Storm
subclassfeature6.description: I have resistance to lightning and thunder damage. When I start casting a 1st-level or higher spell that deals lightning or thunder damage, I deal lightning or thunder damage to a creature within 10 ft of me that I can see

subclassfeature6.1.name: Storm Guide
subclassfeature6.1.description: As an action, I can stop rain around me in 20-ft radius; bonus action for it to resume. As a bonus action, I can choose the direction of wind around me in a 100-ft radius. This lasts until the end of my next turn and doesn't alter the wind's speed

subclassfeature14.name: Storm's Fury
subclassfeature14.description: As a reaction when hit by a melee attack, I can deal lightning damage to the attacker. The attacker must also make a Strength save or be pushed up to 20 ft away from me

subclassfeature18.name: Wind Soul
subclassfeature18.description: I have immunity to lightning and thunder damage and gain magical 60 ft fly speed. As an action, I reduce my fly speed to 30 ft and give allies 30 ft fly speed for 1 hour. I can do this once per short rest for up to 3 + my Charisma modifier allies within 30 ft

subclassfeature1.name: Divine Magic
subclassfeature1.description: When I select my 1st level or higher spells, I can also pick spells from the cleric spell list. These cleric spells count as sorcerer spells for me. I also learn a spell based on my affinity, use the "Choose Feature" button above for this

good.name: Divine Magic: Good
good.description: When I select my 1st level or higher spells, I can also pick spells from the cleric spell list. I also learn Cure Wounds, which doesn't count against my number of spells known. These count as sorcerer spells for me; I can only replace the bonus spell with a cleric spell

evil.name: Divine Magic: Evil
evil.description: When I select my 1st level or higher spells, I can also pick spells from the cleric spell list. I also learn Inflict Wounds, which doesn't count against my number of spells known. These count as sorcerer spells for me; I can only replace the bonus spell with a cleric spell

law.name: Divine Magic: Law
law.description: When I select my 1st level or higher spells, I can also pick spells from the cleric spell list. I also learn Bless, which doesn't count against my number of spells known. These count as sorcerer spells for me; I can only replace the bonus spell with a cleric spell

chaos.name: Divine Magic: Chaos
chaos.description: When I select my 1st level or higher spells, I can also pick spells from the cleric spell list. I also learn Bane, which doesn't count against my number of spells known. These count as sorcerer spells for me; I can only replace the bonus spell with a cleric spell

neutrality.name: Divine Magic: Neutrality
neutrality.description: When I select my 1st level or higher spells, I can also pick spells from the cleric spell list. I learn Protection from Evil × Good; It doesn't count against my number of spells known. These count as sorcerer spells for me; I can only replace the bonus spell with a cleric spell

subclassfeature1.2.name: Favored by the Gods
subclassfeature1.2.description: If I fail a saving throw or miss with an attack roll, I can add 2d4 to the total

subclassfeature6.name: Empowered Healing
subclassfeature6.description: Once per turn, when I or an ally in 5 ft roll dice to healing with a spell, I can reroll dice. By spending 1 sorcery point; I can reroll any number of those dice for that spell once

subclassfeature14.name: Otherworldy Wings
subclassfeature14.description: As a bonus action, I can manifest a pair of spectral wings that give me 30 ft fly speed. These wings last until I become incapacitated or I dismiss them as a bonus action

eagle.name: Otherworldy Wings
eagle.description: As a bonus action, I manifest a pair of spectral eagle wings, giving me 30 ft fly speed. These wings last until I become incapacitated or I dismiss them as a bonus action

bat.name: Otherworldy Wings
bat.description: As a bonus action, I manifest a pair of spectral bat wings, giving me 30 ft fly speed. These wings last until I become incapacitated or I dismiss them as a bonus action

dragonfly.name: Otherworldy Wings
dragonfly.description: As a bonus action, I create a pair of spectral dragonfly wings, giving me 30 ft fly speed. These wings last until I become incapacitated or I dismiss them as a bonus action

subclassfeature18.name: Unearthly Recovery
subclassfeature18.description: As a bonus action when I have less than half of my max HP remaining, I can heal myself. I regain a number of HP equal to half my hit point maximum

subclassfeature1.name: Eyes of the Dark
subclassfeature1.description: I gain 120 ft darkvision

subclassfeature1.1.name: Strength of the Grave
subclassfeature1.1.description: When damage reduces me to 0 HP, that isn't radiant damage or a critical hit, I can make a Charisma save (DC 5 + damage taken) to drop to 1 HP instead

subclassfeature3.name: Darkness
subclassfeature3.description: I learn Darkness, which doesn't count against my number of spells known. I can also cast it by spending 2 sorcery points and then I can see through it normally

subclassfeature6.name: Hound of Ill Omen
subclassfeature6.description:
As a bonus action, I summon a hound within 30 ft of a creature I see within 120 ft. The hound has all the stats of a dire wolf with the following exceptions:
 - It is medium size and counts as a monstrosity not a beast
 - It start with a number of temporary hit points equal to half my sorcerer level
 - At the start of its turn, it automatically knows where the (hidden) target is
 - It can only move towards and make (opportunity) attack against the target
 - It can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain
 - It takes 5 force damage if it ends its turn inside an object. The target has disadvantage on saves vs. my spells while the hound is within 5 ft of it. It disappears if reduced to 0 HP, if the target is reduced to 0 HP, or after 5 minutes

subclassfeature14.name: Shadow Walk
subclassfeature14.description: As a bonus action when I'm in dim light or darkness, I can teleport up to 120 ft. The destination has to be unoccupied, within line of sight, and in dim light or darkness

subclassfeature18.name: Umbral Form
subclassfeature18.description: As a bonus action, I transform into a shadow form for 1 minute. While transformed, I have resistance to all damage except force and radiant damage. Also, I can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. I take 5 force damage if I end my turn inside an object. This ends early if I end it as a bonus action, I die, or I'm incapacitated

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
spellcasting.description: I can cast sorcerer cantrips/spells that I know, using Charisma as my spellcasting ability. I can use an arcane focus as a spellcasting focus

subclassfeature1.name: Sorcerous Origin
subclassfeature1.description: Choose the Sorcerous Origin for your innate powers and put it in the Class field. Choose either Draconic Bloodline, Storm Sorcery, or Wild Magic

font of magic.name: Font of Magic
font of magic.description: As a bonus action, I can use sorcery points to create spell slots and vice versa. I can convert spell slots to sorcery points at a rate of 1 point per spell slot level. I can convert sorcery points to spell slots at the following rate: Level 1 for 2 sorcery points; level 2 for 3 sorcery points; level 3 for 5 sorcery points; Level 4 for 6 sorcery points; level 5 for 7 sorcery points

metamagic.name: Metamagic
metamagic.description: Use the Choose Feature button above to add a Metamagic option to the third page. I can use only 1 Metamagic option on a spell unless otherwise written

careful spell.name: Careful Spell
careful spell.description: [1 sorcery point] If the spell allows a saving throw, I can protect Cha modifier number of creatures. The selected creatures automatically succeed on their saving throws vs. the spell

distant spell.name: Distant Spell
distant spell.description: [1 sorcery point] I double the range of the spell or make the range 30 ft if the range was touch

empowered spell.name: Empowered Spell
empowered spell.description: [1 sorcery point] If the spell uses damage dice, I can reroll my Charisma modifier number of damage dice. I can Empower a spell even if I use another Metamagic option on it

extended spell.name: Extended Spell
extended spell.description: [1 sorcery point] If the spell has a duration of at least 1 min, I can double it, up to 24 hours

heightened spell.name: Heightened Spell
heightened spell.description: [3 sorcery points] If the spell allows a saving throw, I can have one target get disadv. on their first save

quickened spell.name: Quickened Spell
quickened spell.description: [2 sorcery points] If the spell has a casting time of 1 action, I can cast it as a bonus action

subtle spell.name: Subtle Spell
subtle spell.description: [1 sorcery point] I can cast the spell without the need to use somatic or verbal components

twinned spell.name: Twinned Spell
twinned spell.description: [1 sorcery point per spell level, minimum 1] If spell/cantrip has a target of one and not self, I can aim it at second target within range

sorcerous restoration.name: Sorcerous Restoration
sorcerous restoration.description: I regain 4 expended sorcery points whenever I finish a short rest

Classes.name: Warlock
skills: Choose two from Arcana, Deception, History, Intimidation, Investigation, Nature, and Religion.
Classes.equipment: Warlock starting equipment: A light crossbow and 20 bolts -or- any simple weapon; A component pouch -or- an arcane focus; A scholar's pack -or- a dungeoneer's pack Leather armor, any simple weapon, and two daggers. Alternatively, choose 4d4 x 10 gp worth of starting equipment instead of both the class' and the background's starting equipment.

subclassfeature1.name: Dark One's Blessing
subclassfeature1.description: When I reduce a hostile to 0 HP, I gain Cha mod + warlock level temporary HP (min 1)

subclassfeature6.name: Dark One's Own Luck
subclassfeature6.description: When I make an ability check or saving throw, I can add 1d10 after rolling the d20

subclassfeature10.name: Fiendish Resilience
subclassfeature10.description: After a short or long rest, I can choose one damage type to become resistance to. This lasts until I choose another type; Magical and silver weapons ignore this resistance

subclassfeature14.name: Hurl Through Hell
subclassfeature14.description: When I hit a creature with an attack, I can instantly transport it through lower planes. It returns at the end of my next turn and takes 10d10 psychic damage if not a fiend

subclassfeature1.name: Fey Presence
subclassfeature1.description:
As an action, all creatures in a 10-ft cube around me must make a Wisdom save
   If failed, they're all charmed or frightened (my choice) until the end of my next turn

subclassfeature6.name: Misty Escape
subclassfeature6.description:
As a reaction, when I take damage, I can turn invisible and teleport up to 60 ft
   I stay invisible until the start of my next turn or until I attack or cast a spell

subclassfeature10.name: Beguiling Defenses
subclassfeature10.description:
As a reaction, when a creature tries to charm me, I can turn the charm back on it
   It must make a Wis save or be charmed by me for 1 minute or until taking damage
   I am immune to being charmed

subclassfeature14.name: Dark Delirium
subclassfeature14.description:
As an action, a creature within 60 ft must make a Wis save or be charmed/frightened
   This lasts for 1 minute or until my concentration is broken or it takes damage
   During this time, it can't see or hear anything but the illusion, me, and itself

subclassfeature1.name: Awakened Mind
subclassfeature1.description: I can telepathically speak to creatures I can see within 30 ft if they know a language

subclassfeature6.name: Entropic Ward
subclassfeature6.description:
As a reaction, when I'm attacked, I can impose disadvantage to that attack roll
   If it misses me, I have adv. on my next attack vs. the attacker during my next turn

subclassfeature10.name: Thought Shield
subclassfeature10.description:
No one can read my mind unless I allow it; I have resistance to psychic damage
   When I take psychic damage, the dealer of the psychic damage takes the same amount

subclassfeature14.name: Create Thrall
subclassfeature14.description:
As an action, I can charm an incapacitated humanoid by touch
   While it is charmed, I can communicate with it telepathically if it is on the same plane
   This lasts until the charm is removed (can be by Remove Curse) or I use this again

subclassfeature1.name: Among the Dead
subclassfeature1.description:
I learn the Spare the Dying cantrip and gain advantage on saving throws vs. diseases
If an undead targets me directly with an attack or spell, it must make a Wisdom save
On a fail, it must choose a new target or forfeit its attack or harmful spell
On a success or if I attack or cast a harmful spell on it, it is immune for 24 hours

subclassfeature6.name: Defy Death
subclassfeature6.description:
I regain 1d8 + my Constitution modifier in HP when I succeed on a Death saving throw
I also regain this amount whenever I use Spare the Dying to stabilize a creature

subclassfeature10.name: Undying Nature
subclassfeature10.description:
I can hold my breath indefinitely; I don't require food, water, or sleep (I still need rest)
I age more slowly, only 1 year for every 10 years that pass; I can't be magically aged

subclassfeature14.name: Indestructible Life
subclassfeature14.description: As a bonus action, I can regain HP and reattach severed body parts

subclassfeature1.name: Bonus Cantrips
subclassfeature1.description: I learn the Light and Sacred Flame cantrips, not counting for the number I can know

subclassfeature1.1.name: Healing Light
subclassfeature1.1.description: As a bonus action, I can heal a creature I can see within 60 ft by expending dice. I can expend up to my Charisma modifier (min 1) of dice from my pool at a time. The target heals HP equal to the roll of the dice; I regain all expended dice on a long rest

subclassfeature6.name: Radiant Soul
subclassfeature6.description: I add my Cha modifier once to the fire or radiant damage of cantrips and spells I cast. This bonus only applies to one damage roll; Also, I have resistance to radiant damage

atkCalc: if (isSpell && (/fire|radiant/i).test(fields.Damage_Type)) { output.extraDmg += What('Cha Mod'); };
Cantrips and spells that deal fire or radiant damage get my Charisma modifier added to the damage once.

subclassfeature10.name: Celestial Resilience
subclassfeature10.description: When I finish a short or long rest, I and up to five allies gain temporary hit points. I get my warlock level + Cha mod, while my allies get half my warlock level + Cha mod

subclassfeature14.name: Searing Vengeance
subclassfeature14.description: At the start of my turn when I would make a death save, I can instead spring back up. I recover HP equal to half my current HP maximum, and can then stand up if I choose. When I do, creatures of my choice within 30 ft take 2d8 + Cha mod in radiant damage. Damaged creatures are blinded until the end of my current turn

subclassfeature1.name: Hexblade's Curse
subclassfeature1.description:
As a bonus action, I can curse a creature I can see within 30 ft of me for 1 minute
 - I add my proficiency bonus to damage rolls against the cursed target
 - My attack rolls against the curse target score a critical hit on a roll of 19 and 20
 - If the target dies while cursed, I regain HP equal to my warlock level + Cha mod
The curse ends after 1 minute, when the target dies, I die, or I'm incapacitated

atkAdd: if (!isDC && (/curse/i).test(WeaponText) && !CritChance) {var CritChance:19; fields.Description += (fields.Description ? '; ' : '') + 'Crit on 19-20'; };

If I include the word 'Curse' in the name of a weapon, the automation will treat the attack as being against a target of the Hexblade's Curse: adding my proficiency bonus to the damage and adding the increased chance of a critical hit to the description.
atkCalc: if ((/curse/i).test(WeaponText)) {output.extraDmg += output.prof; };

subclassfeature1.1.name: Hex Warrior
subclassfeature1.1.description: I gain proficiency with medium armor, shields, and martial weapons. When I finish a long rest, I can imbue one weapon I touch with my will. Until my next long rest, I can use it with Charisma instead of Strength or Dexterity. I have to be proficient with the weapon and that is can't have the two-handed property. This benefit also works with every weapon from Pact of the Blade, with no restriction

atkAdd: if ((/\bpact\b/i).test(WeaponText) || ((/hexblade/i).test(WeaponText) && !(/\b(2|two).?hand(ed)?s?\b/i).test(WeaponText))) { fields.Mod:What('Cha Mod') > What(AbilityScores.abbreviations[fields.Mod - 1] + ' Mod') ? 6 : fields.Mod; };

If I include either the word 'Hexblade' or 'Pact' in a weapon's name, it gets treated as my the weapon I imbued to use Charisma instead of Strength or Dexterity, if my Charisma modifier is higher than it would otherwise use. For a 'Pact' weapon, this will with any type. For 'Hexblade', this will only work if the weapon doesn't have the two-handed property.

subclassfeature6.name: Accursed Specter
subclassfeature6.description: When I slay a humanoid, I can curse its soul and have it rise as a specter from its corpse. It has the stats of a specter (MM 279) with temporary HP equal to half my warlock level. It rolls initiative and has its own turns, obeying my verbal commands. It gains a bonus to attack rolls equal to my Charisma modifier (min +0). The specter remains until the end of my next long rest, at which point it vanishes.

subclassfeature10.name: Armor of Hexes
subclassfeature10.description: As a reaction when a Hexblade's Curse recipient hits me with an attack, I can roll a d6. On a result of 4 or higher, the attacks misses me instead, regardless of its d20 roll

subclassfeature14.name: Master of Hexes
subclassfeature14.description: When the target of my Hexblade's Curse dies, I can curse another I can see within 30 ft. I can't do this while incapacitated and I don't regain HP from the death of the previous

subclassfeature1.name: Bonus Proficiency
subclassfeature1.description: I am proficient with hacking tools and know the On/Off cantrip

subclassfeature1.1.name: Information Surge
subclassfeature1.1.description: As an action, I can cause a computerized device within 30 ft to make an Int save. If the device is held/used by a creature, that creature makes the saving throw. If the device is not held/used, it makes a save with a +0 modifier and disadvantage. On a failed save, the device stops functioning until the end of my next turn

subclassfeature6.name: Wire Walk
subclassfeature6.description: As a bonus action, I can teleport through a hardwired network to a point I can see. Both where I start and end must be a device, cable, or socket connected to the network

subclassfeature10.name: Personal Encryption
subclassfeature10.description: I have adv. on saves vs. scrying, thought detection, and magics for learning my location. If the effect doesn't let me a save, the user has disadv. on checks to use it on me, if any

subclassfeature14.name: Technovirus
subclassfeature14.description: As an action, I make a melee spell attack to infect someone with a techno-organic virus. The target takes 8d10 psychic damage, or half that with a successful Con save. If it failed its save, I can use an action to cast Command on it while it remains infected. It makes its save vs. this Command with disadvantage and I can cast it at any range. It is infected until my next long rest; The virus can be removed with Lesser Restoration

pact magic.name: Pact Magic
pact magic.description: I can cast warlock cantrips/spells that I know, using Charisma as my spellcasting ability. I can use an arcane focus as a spellcasting focus. I regain these spell slots on a short rest

subclassfeature1.name: Otherworldly Patron
subclassfeature1.description: Choose the Otherworldly Patron you have a bargain with and put it in the Class field. Choose either the Archfey, the Fiend, the Great Old One, or the Undying

eldritch invocations.name: Eldritch Invocations
eldritch invocations.description: Use the Choose Feature button above to add Eldritch Invocations to the third page. Whenever I gain a warlock level, I can replace an invocation I know with another
extrachoices: Book of Ancient Secrets (prereq: Pact of the Tome)
Chains of Carceri (prereq: level 15 warlock, Pact of the Chain)
Lifedrinker (prereq: level 12 warlock, Pact of the Blade)
Master of Myriad Forms (prereq: level 15 warlock)
Sign of Ill Omen (prereq: level 5 warlock)
Thirsting Blade (prereq: level 5 warlock, Pact of the Blade)
Visions of Distant Realms (prereq: level 15 warlock)
Voice of the Chain Master (prereq: Pact of the Chain)
Whispers of the Grave (prereq: level 9 warlock)

agonizing blast (prereq: eldritch blast.name: Agonizing Blast
agonizing blast (prereq: eldritch blast.description: I can add my Charisma modifier to the damage of my Eldritch Blast cantrip

armor of shadows.name: Armor of Shadows
armor of shadows.description: I can cast Mage Armor on myself at will, without spell slots or material comp. (PHB 256)

ascendant step (prereq: level 9 warlock).name: Ascendant Step
ascendant step (prereq: level 9 warlock).description: I can cast Levitate on myself at will, without spell slots or material comp. (PHB 255)

beast speech.name: Beast Speech
beast speech.description: I can cast Speak with Animals at will, without using spell slots (PHB 277)

beguiling influence.name: Beguiling Influence
beguiling influence.description: I gain proficiencies with the Deception and Persuasion skills

bewitching whispers (prereq: level 7 war.name: Bewitching Whispers
bewitching whispers (prereq: level 7 war.description: Once per long rest, I can cast Compulsion using a warlock spell slot (PHB 224)

book of ancient secrets (prereq: pact of.name: Book of Ancient Secrets
book of ancient secrets (prereq: pact of.description: I can add any two 1st-level spells that have the ritual tag to my Book of Shadows. If I come across spells with the ritual tag, I can transcribe them into my book, as well. I can cast any of these spells in my Book of Shadows as rituals, but not as normal spells. I can cast my known warlock spells as rituals if they have the ritual tag
